original: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: which has the nature of emptiness, the characteristic of the dharmakāya.

original: de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can dang lhan cig sdom pa ste gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can dang lhan cig sdom pa ste gcig pa nyid do //
translated: It is the union with the essence body, which is the nature of non-objectifying compassion.

original: de la snying rje ni zla ba byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: de la snying rje ni zla ba byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: Compassion is the moon, the thought of enlightenment.

original: bzla ba'i rkang pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen bo sgrib pa med pa /
analyzed: bzla ba'i rkang pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen bo sgrib pa med pa /
translated: The twenty-five parts of the moon are the nature of the great bliss, which is free from obscurations.

original: nyi ma bcu gnyis stong pa'i bdag nyid can de dang lhan cig sdom pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo sdom pa ste /
analyzed: nyi ma bcu gnyis stong pa'i bdag nyid can de dang lhan cig sdom pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo sdom pa ste /
translated: The union with the twelve suns, which are the nature of the emptinesses, is the union of the circle of dakinis.

original: bdag gis bshad ces bya ba'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bshad ces bya ba'i nges pa'o //
translated: The certainty is I have explained.

original: de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas /
translated: In this way,🔽the supreme great secret is the delight,

original: gsang chen mchog tu dgyes pa dang // thams cad bdag nyid na rtag bzhugs //
analyzed: gsang chen mchog tu dgyes pa dang // thams cad bdag nyid na rtag bzhugs //
translated: and the nature of all is the constant abode.

original: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
translated: The hero, the messenger, is the nature of all.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi dbyings chos can thams cad bdag nyid na rtag tu thams cad kyi tshe 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang la ltar byung ba'i dus na bzhugs zhes pa skye ba dang
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi dbyings chos can thams cad bdag nyid na rtag tu thams cad kyi tshe 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang la ltar byung ba'i dus na bzhugs zhes pa skye ba dang
translated: Vajrasattva, supreme bliss.

original: 'jig pa'i chos dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa'i chos dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the expanse of emptiness that was previously mentioned is the nature of all phenomena, and it is said to abide at all times, in the past, future, and present, because it is free from the phenomena of arising and🔽ceasing.

original: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
translated: The hero is the nature of all messengers.

original: zhes pa pho nya mo ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa pho nya mo ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
translated: The messengers are the dakinis.

original: de rnams phung po dang khams dang skye mched sgrib pa spangs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams phung po dang khams dang skye mched sgrib pa spangs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: They are equal to space, free from the aggregates, elements, sense bases, and obscurations.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba la dee zhes pa khams bklags pa las nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin gyis /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba la dee zhes pa khams bklags pa las nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin gyis /
translated: The one who moves in space is called a dakini because she moves in space.

original: gnas dang nye pa'i gnas na gnas pa grong gi lha mo sems can thams cad la gnod pa byed pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnas dang nye pa'i gnas na gnas pa grong gi lha mo sems can thams cad la gnod pa byed pa rnams ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: She is not a village goddess who resides in a place or a nearby place and harms all sentient beings.

original: de rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni de'i rang bzhin te pho nya kun rang @85a * //🔽bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni de'i rang bzhin te pho nya kun rang @85a * // bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: The nature of all messengers is that.

original: sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa'i mtshan nyid can chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa'i mtshan nyid can chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The hero is the dharmakāya, which has the characteristic of the three realms.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku bzhi pa ste /
translated: Vajrasattva is the supreme bliss, the fourth, the innate body.

original: mchog tu bde ba 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba zhes pa'i don no //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba zhes pa'i don no //
translated: It is the supreme bliss, the unchanging bliss.

original: chos dang lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'di dag gcig pa nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: chos dang lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'di dag gcig pa nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: These two bodies, the dharmakāya and the innate body, are one and the same, and should be called “Vajrasattva.”

original: rdo rje zhes pa chos kyi sku stong pa nyid shes rab bo //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa chos kyi sku stong pa nyid shes rab bo //
translated: Vajra is the dharmakāya, emptiness, wisdom.

original: sems dpa' zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dang snying rje dang thabs so //
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dang snying rje dang thabs so //
translated: Sattva is the innate body, compassion, method.

original: de ltar shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid he ru ka'i yang dag par sbyor ba ni rdo rje sems dpar mngon par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid he ru ka'i yang dag par sbyor ba ni rdo rje sems dpar mngon par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the perfect union of Heruka, whose nature is wisdom and means, should be expressed as Vajrasattva.

original: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
translated: This is the self-arisen Bhagavān,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: the binding of the dakini's net.

original: zhes pa 'dir rang byung ni tshangs pa'o //🔽de yang sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir rang byung ni tshangs pa'o // de yang sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: Here, self-arisen refers to Brahmā.🔽And Brahmā is the vajra body of Vairocana.

original: tshangs pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: tshangs pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: Brahmā is the vajra body holder.

original: zhes pa'i gsung la rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i gsung la rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood from other tantras.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: And it is as follows.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: In the Net of Illusory Manifestations, the Bhagavān declares:

original: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
translated: Self-arisen, arisen from space,

original: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
translated: the great fire of wisdom and gnosis,

original: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
analyzed: 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed //
translated: the great light, the illuminator,

original: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba lam me ba //
translated: the great lamp of the light of gnosis,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so forth, up to:

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
translated: the great vajra hook and noose.

original: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood from the verses in the assembly at the end.

original: rang byung ni rnam par snang mdzad sprul pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sngom pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: rang byung ni rnam par snang mdzad sprul pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sngom pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the binding of the dakini's net.

original: sgra yi tshul las rnam par 'das //
analyzed: sgra yi tshul las rnam par 'das //
translated: Beyond the way of sound,

original: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul te //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul te //
translated: the domain of conduct of the commitments.

original: zhes pa 'di las lhan cig skyes pa dang chos dang sprul pa'i sku gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di las lhan cig skyes pa dang chos dang sprul pa'i sku gcig tu sbyar ba'i phyir /
translated: This is because the innate, dharma, and emanation bodies are combined into one.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sgra'i tshul can te /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sgra'i tshul can te /
translated: The enjoyment body is the way of sound.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad gzhom du med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad gzhom du med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the omniscient language that is indestructible.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni sngags kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni sngags kyi sku ste /
translated: Its nature is the mantra body.

original: dam tshig spyod pa rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur pa n'a da'i rang bzhin sngags kyi lha gzhom du med pa'i rang bzhin gyi skad do //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur pa n'a da'i rang bzhin sngags kyi lha gzhom du med pa'i rang bzhin gyi skad do //
translated: When it becomes the domain of conduct of those who practice the commitments, it is the nature of the mantra deity, the indestructible nature of language.

original: 'di gang gi spyod yul dang rtogs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yul gyis dam tshig gi spyod pa de ni 'chad par 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di gang gi spyod yul dang rtogs par 'gyur ba'i spyod yul gyis dam tshig gi spyod pa de ni 'chad par 'gyur bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: The conduct of the commitments, which is the domain of realization of this, will be explained.

original: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /🔽chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa / chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan //
translated: Thus the Bhagavān has said:🔽The Dharma conch, endowed with great sound,

original: chos @85b kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
analyzed: chos @85b kyi gand'i sgra bo che //
translated: The great sound of the Dharma drum,

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po //
translated: The one who has passed beyond suffering without abiding,

original: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
analyzed: phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che //
translated: The great Dharma drum of the ten directions.

original: zhes pa'o // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ;
analyzed: zhes pa'o // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ;
translated: This wisdom, which is difficult to find in the three worlds,

original: / thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
analyzed: / thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
translated: Abides perfectly in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: zhes pa ye shes 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa 'jig rten gsum mtho ris dang sa stengs dang sa 'og rnams su chos thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa /
analyzed: zhes pa ye shes 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i bdag nyid ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa 'jig rten gsum mtho ris dang sa stengs dang sa 'og rnams su chos thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa /
translated: This wisdom, which is difficult to find in the three worlds—the higher realms, the earth, and the underworld—is the connate, the dharmakāya, the saṃbhogakāya, and the nirmāṇakāya, which have become a single entity of wisdom, mind, speech, and body, abiding perfectly in all phenomena.

original: bsod nams dman pa rnams kyis rnyed par dka' ba'o /🔽// thog ma dbus mthar zhes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus su yang dag par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams dman pa rnams kyis rnyed par dka' ba'o / // thog ma dbus mthar zhes pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus su yang dag par gnas pa ste /
translated: It is difficult to attain for those of little merit.🔽It abides in the beginning, middle, and end, in the past, future, and present times.

original: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
analyzed: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
translated: It abides in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: zhes pa'o // bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba las //
translated: From the union of churning and being churned,

original: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
analyzed: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
translated: endowed with mantra recitation, contemplation, and so forth,

original: zhes pa 'dir ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor bas ji ltar gyur pa rnal 'byor nyid sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa bsrub cing bsrubs pa'i sbyor bas ji ltar gyur pa rnal 'byor nyid sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: Here, that very wisdom is the yoga of the yogins, endowed with the churning and being churned of the union of the two organs, as previously explained.

original: cho ga'i ye shes ni 'jig rten pa'i cho ga'i ye shes dngos grub ste /
analyzed: cho ga'i ye shes ni 'jig rten pa'i cho ga'i ye shes dngos grub ste /
translated: The wisdom of ritual is the mundane ritual wisdom of spiritual powers,

original: sngags bzlas pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bsam gtan gyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bsam gtan gyis grub pa'o //
translated: accomplished by mantra recitation and the contemplation of the maṇḍala wheel.

original: sogs pa'i sgras sbyin sreg la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya ba de nyid ye shes te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras sbyin sreg la sogs pa rnams dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya ba de nyid ye shes te /
translated: The term “and so forth” includes the fire sacrifice and so forth.

original: cho ga'i ye shes 'jig rten pa'i ye shes zhes pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga'i ye shes 'jig rten pa'i ye shes zhes pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the rite is the mundane knowledge.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor nyid ni sngar brjod pa'i stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor nyid ni sngar brjod pa'i stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Thus, yoga is the nature of emptiness and compassion as previously described.

original: kyang gi sgra las cho ga'i ye shes kyang ste /
analyzed: kyang gi sgra las cho ga'i ye shes kyang ste /
translated: And also means and the knowledge of the rite.

original: rgyud du nges par gsungs pa zhes pa gang zhig mngon par brjod pa 'bum par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud du nges par gsungs pa zhes pa gang zhig mngon par brjod pa 'bum par gsungs pa'o //
translated: What is definitely taught in the tantra is what is taught in the Hundred Thousand Verse Tantra.

original: de bdag gis da ni bsdus pa'i rgyud du rdo rje phag mo la bstan par bya yis /
analyzed: de bdag gis da ni bsdus pa'i rgyud du rdo rje phag mo la bstan par bya yis /
translated: I, the teacher, will now teach that in the Condensed Tantra to Vajravarahi.🔽Listen to the essence of the essence, the supreme tantra.

original: snying po las snying po mchog gi rgyud nyon cig ces pa ston pa po dang gsol ba 'debs pa po'i 'brel pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa dang bcas pa'i 'grel bshad kyis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rab tu gsal bar byas pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa zhes pa'o /
analyzed: snying po las snying po mchog gi rgyud nyon cig ces pa ston pa po dang gsol ba 'debs pa po'i 'brel pa dang / brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa dang bcas pa'i 'grel bshad kyis drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyis rab tu gsal bar byas pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa zhes pa'o /
translated: The teacher and the one who requests the teaching are connected, and the explanation with the connection of the expressed and the expresser, and the elucidation with the provisional and definitive meanings is the certainty of the Bhagavat.

original: // / da ni rigs ldan ma'i mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni rigs ldan ma'i mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now the worship of the yoginis is to be stated.

original: dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba //
analyzed: dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba //
translated: The exhalation in the middle of the supreme

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.
Here

original: li k'a li dag gi dbus su me ri lta bur rab tu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: li k'a li dag gi dbus su me ri lta bur rab tu 'bab pa'o //
translated: in the middle of the vowels and consonants, it flows like a firebrand.

original: de'i dbugs ni drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams kyi dbus su nyin mtshan gyi dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'pho ba rnams la bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya'i grangs rnams so //
analyzed: de'i dbugs ni drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams kyi dbus su nyin mtshan gyi dus sbyor bcu gnyis 'pho ba rnams la bdun cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i drug brgya'i grangs rnams so //
translated: Its exhalation is in the middle of twenty-one thousand and six hundred, and in the transits of the twelve two-hour periods of the day and night, it is the number of six hundred and seventy-five.

original: lhag ma rkang pa dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag dgu lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu'i grangs ni dus sbyor bcu gnyis po rnams la la la n'a dang ra sa n'a rab tu 'bab pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma rkang pa dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag dgu lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu'i grangs ni dus sbyor bcu gnyis po rnams la la la n'a dang ra sa n'a rab tu 'bab pa ste /
translated: The remainder, the number of twenty thousand and nine hundred with the feet, is the flow of lalanā and rasanā in the twelve two-hour periods.

original: lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la so sor dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad la la n'a ra rab tu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la so sor dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad la la n'a ra rab tu 'bab pa'o //
translated: In the uneven two-hour periods of Aries and so on, the flow of lalanā and rasanā is eighteen hundred breaths in each.

original: de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la so sor ra sa n'a ra rab tu 'bab po //
analyzed: de bzhin du glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor la so sor ra sa n'a ra rab tu 'bab po //
translated: Likewise, the breath flows in the rasana and the lalanā at the same time in the equalizing conjunctions of the bull and so forth.

original: de dag gi dang po dang tha ma'i dbugs 'pho ba so so'i dus la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi dbus su dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'i las rkang pa dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug gi grangs rnams te /
analyzed: de dag gi dang po dang tha ma'i dbugs 'pho ba so so'i dus la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi dbus su dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'i las rkang pa dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug gi grangs rnams te /
translated: The first and last breaths of those are in the equalizing and unequalizing conjunctions, in the middle of the fifty-six breaths of the central channel, the avadhūtī, together with the half-breaths.

original: dman pa'i srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba rigs ldan ma'i dus yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin 'chi ltas kyis 'chi bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: dman pa'i srog chags rnams la 'chi ba ster ba rigs ldan ma'i dus yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin 'chi ltas kyis 'chi bar byed pa ste /
translated: The death omens, which are the nature of the arising of the time of the Kṛttikā ṛṣi, give death to inferior beings.

original: dus me'i rab tu rgyu ba las so //
analyzed: dus me'i rab tu rgyu ba las so //
translated: Death is caused by the movement of the fire of time.

original: lhag ma rkang pa dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug gis dman pa'i dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rkang pa dang bcas pa lnga bcu rtsa drug gis dman pa'i dbugs brgya phrag bco brgyad la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa'o //
translated: The remaining breaths, which are fifty-six less than one hundred and eight, are the five movements of the Kṛttikā and Rohiṇī maṇḍalas.

original: de rnams la dkyil 'khor so sor 'bab pa drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya'i grangs te rkang pa dang bcas pa'i dbugs bcu gcig gis dman pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la dkyil 'khor so sor 'bab pa drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya'i grangs te rkang pa dang bcas pa'i dbugs bcu gcig gis dman pa'o //
translated: These are the number of the individual mandalas, which is more than sixty and less than three hundred.

original: 'dir la la n'a las nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga dang / ra sa n'a na sa sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga ste g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir la la n'a las nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga dang / ra sa n'a na sa sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga ste g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la'o //
translated: Here, in the left and right nostrils, there are five mandalas of space, etc., and five mandalas of earth, etc.

original: 'dir lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma la grangs ji ltar bar dbus dang shar dang g-yas dang g-yon dang nub tu stong pa dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / lte ba la rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang drug go //
analyzed: 'dir lte ba'i padma'i 'dab ma la grangs ji ltar bar dbus dang shar dang g-yas dang g-yon dang nub tu stong pa dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / lte ba la rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang drug go //
translated: Here, in the lotus of the navel, there are six mandalas: in the center, east, right, left, and west, the mandalas of space, wind, fire, water, and earth, and in the center, the mandala of pure gnosis.

original: steng du sna'i bu ga dag la ji lta ba bzhin du dbus dang steng dang g-yas dang g-yon dang 'og la rim pa ji lta bas g-yon la stong ba la sogs pa dang g-yas la sa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: steng du sna'i bu ga dag la ji lta ba bzhin du dbus dang steng dang g-yas dang g-yon dang 'og la rim pa ji lta bas g-yon la stong ba la sogs pa dang g-yas la sa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Above, in the nostrils, there are the mandalas of space, etc., in the left, and the mandalas of earth, etc., in the right, in the center, above, right, left, and below, in that order.

original: drug pa ni sna'i bu ga dag la cig car gyi rkang pa dang bcas pa'i dbugs lnga bcu rtsa drug gi @86b bdag nyid ces pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa ni sna'i bu ga dag la cig car gyi rkang pa dang bcas pa'i dbugs lnga bcu rtsa drug gi @86b bdag nyid ces pa'o //
translated: The sixth is the nature of fifty-six breaths together with the foot in the nostrils.

original: dkyil 'khor 'di rnams kyi g-yon pa dang g-yas par rab tu 'bab pa'i dbugs rnams rtsa kun du rgyu ba'i stobs rnams sam srog rtsol gyi stobs kyis kyang dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'i la rab tu zhugs par gyur pas thun mong ba'i 'chi ltas kyis 'chi ba
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'di rnams kyi g-yon pa dang g-yas par rab tu 'bab pa'i dbugs rnams rtsa kun du rgyu ba'i stobs rnams sam srog rtsol gyi stobs kyis kyang dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'i la rab tu zhugs par gyur pas thun mong ba'i 'chi ltas kyis 'chi ba
translated: By the power of the winds flowing in the channels, or by the power of prāṇāyāma, the winds flowing to the left and right of these maṇḍalas enter the central madhyamā avadhūti channel, and the common signs of death are

original: bslu bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bslu bar 'gyur ro //
translated: cheated.

original: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis dbu ma la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir mchog ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis dbu ma la rab tu zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir mchog ste /
translated: By the power of yoga, they enter the madhyamā, and so it is supreme.

original: srog chen por gyur pa dman pa thun mong ba rnams kyis 'joms par byed pa /
analyzed: srog chen por gyur pa dman pa thun mong ba rnams kyis 'joms par byed pa /
translated: It is the great life-force, which is destroyed by the inferior commoners.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ster ba /
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba ster ba /
translated: It bestows supreme unchanging bliss.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes rang rig pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes rang rig pa /
translated: It is the self-awareness gnosis of the yogi.

original: phyi rol gyi dbang bo dang yul gyi bde ba 'jig pa'i rang bzhin spangs pa mchog gi dbang pos rtogs par bya ba dbugs kyi 'khor lo'i grangs lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin can te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dbang bo dang yul gyi bde ba 'jig pa'i rang bzhin spangs pa mchog gi dbang pos rtogs par bya ba dbugs kyi 'khor lo'i grangs lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin can te /
translated: The supreme organ, which is to be realized by the supreme organ that has abandoned the nature of the destruction of the bliss of external organs and objects, is the number of the wheel of breath, which has the nature of innate joy.

original: bde ba chen po 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Because it is the great bliss that does not fall.

original: de rnams las so sor mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i dbugs ni mchog ste /
analyzed: de rnams las so sor mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i dbugs ni mchog ste /
translated: From among those, the supreme breath of supreme unchanging bliss is supreme.

original: dbu ma mchog gi dbugs zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dbu ma mchog gi dbugs zhes pa'o //
translated: It is called the breath of the supreme central channel.🔽Then:

original: de nas / dbu ma mchog gi dbugs dang ni //
analyzed: de nas / dbu ma mchog gi dbugs dang ni //
translated: With the breath of the supreme central channel

original: dri dang chu dang bcas pa yis //
analyzed: dri dang chu dang bcas pa yis //
translated: and with scent and water.

original: zhes pa la 'dir dri zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad dang zla ba'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la 'dir dri zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad dang zla ba'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
translated: Here, “scent” is the descent of the breath of Vairocana and the moon.

original: 'og dang steng du la la n'a'o //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du la la n'a'o //
translated: It is lalana above and below.

original: chu zhes pa mi bskyod pa dang nyi ma'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
analyzed: chu zhes pa mi bskyod pa dang nyi ma'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
translated: “Water” is the descent of the breath of Akshobhya and the sun.

original: 'og dang steng du ra sa n'a'o //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du ra sa n'a'o //
translated: It is rasanā above and below.

original: dbu ma zhes pa khu ba dang rdul dang sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
analyzed: dbu ma zhes pa khu ba dang rdul dang sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i dbugs rab tu 'bab pa ste /
translated: The middle is the middle channel, the avadhūtī, which is the flow of semen, blood, Rāhu, and the breath of the fire of time.

original: 'og dang steng du aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
translated: The middle is the avadhūtī, which is below and above.

original: dbu ma aa wadh'u t'i'i dbugs 'gyur ba med pa ni srog chags rnams kyi 'chi ba ster ba thun mong ba'i 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba slu bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbu ma aa wadh'u t'i'i dbugs 'gyur ba med pa ni srog chags rnams kyi 'chi ba ster ba thun mong ba'i 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba slu bar byed pa ste /
translated: The breath of the middle channel, the avadhūtī, is the unchanging life force that grants death to all living beings. It is the deception of death, the common signs of death.

original: mchog ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ba'o //🔽de'i phyir / dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba //
analyzed: mchog ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ba'o // de'i phyir / dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba //
translated: The supreme is the supreme, unchanging bliss that grants the attainment of mahāmudrā.

original: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore it is said, “The supreme breath of the middle channel.”

original: de nyid 'og dang steng du bshang gci zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa rnams dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid 'og dang steng du bshang gci zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa rnams dang ldan pa ste /
translated: That is below and above, endowed with the channels of feces and urine, the moon and sun,

original: khu ba dang rdul dang sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i rtsa ro mnyam du gyur pa /
analyzed: khu ba dang rdul dang sgra gcan dang dus kyi me'i rtsa ro mnyam du gyur pa /
translated: semen and blood, Rāhu and the fire of time, of equal taste.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le bzhi 'dzin pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le bzhi 'dzin pa /
translated: It holds the four bindus of bodhicitta.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro mnyam par gyur pa /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ro mnyam par gyur pa /
translated: It is of equal taste with the body, voice, and mind.

original: steng dang 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhes pa'o //
translated: Above and below are the single-pronged vajras.

original: de nas dbu ma mchog gi dbugs des /
analyzed: de nas dbu ma mchog gi dbugs des /
translated: Then, by that supreme central channel wind,

original: dri dang chu dang bcas pa yis /
analyzed: dri dang chu dang bcas pa yis /
translated: together with smell and water,

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis @87a * //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis @87a * //
translated: the nature of innate joy,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spongs pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs chen pos las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu dang bral bas phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur gyur pas rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes rang rig pas yul dang dbang po gcig tu 'dres par
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spongs pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbugs chen pos las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyu dang bral bas phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur gyur pas rnal 'byor pa'i ye shes rang rig pas yul dang dbang po gcig tu 'dres par
translated: through abandoning the apprehended and the apprehender, the great wind of the vajra holder, free from the cause of the karma consort and the gnosis consort, becomes the cause of the great seal, and the gnosis of the yogin, self-awareness, becomes the object and sense organ merged into one.

original: gyur pa / lte bar gtum mo 'bar bas phung po dang khams dang skye mched bsregs te /
analyzed: gyur pa / lte bar gtum mo 'bar bas phung po dang khams dang skye mched bsregs te /
translated: The blazing caṇḍālī at the navel burns the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: dpral ba'i zla ba bzhu ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzag pa med pa steng du 'gro ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sku yis /
analyzed: dpral ba'i zla ba bzhu ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzag pa med pa steng du 'gro ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sku yis /
translated: The nectar of the melting moon at the forehead descends without dripping and moves upward, arising from the supreme unchanging bliss, the body of the innate.

original: a'a li dang k'a li dang h'um phat yi ge dang bral bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa spangs pas sngags bzlas pa dang phyag rgya dang byin gyis brlab pa dang bla ma'i bka' kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams las phyi rol tu gyur pas /
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li dang h'um phat yi ge dang bral bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa spangs pas sngags bzlas pa dang phyag rgya dang byin gyis brlab pa dang bla ma'i bka' kun du spyod pa'i chos rnams las phyi rol tu gyur pas /
translated: Since it is free from the syllables ā, kā, li, huṃ, and phaṭ, it is beyond the meditation of the maṇḍala cakra. Since it is beyond mantra recitation, mudra, and consecration, it is beyond the Dharma of the guru’s command.🔽Since it does not abide in either samsara or nirvana, compassion and emptiness are inseparable.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu mi gnas pas snying rje dang stong pa nyid dbyer med pas /
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu mi gnas pas snying rje dang stong pa nyid dbyer med pas /
translated: The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti, which is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.

original: dpal ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug pa bar ma chad par byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'u gzugs kyis 'dzag pa med pa'i chags pa chen pos dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba 'dis /🔽rtag tu rigs ldan ma mchod bya //
analyzed: dpal ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug pa bar ma chad par byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'u gzugs kyis 'dzag pa med pa'i chags pa chen pos dbu ma mchog gi dbugs 'byung ba 'dis / rtag tu rigs ldan ma mchod bya //
translated: The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.🔽The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.

original: zhes pa 'dir rigs ldan ma ni dbu ma aa wa dhu t'i'i rdo rje phag mo sgrib pa med pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir rigs ldan ma ni dbu ma aa wa dhu t'i'i rdo rje phag mo sgrib pa med pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs pa /
translated: The supreme path of the avadhūti is the supreme path of the avadhūti.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bdud kyi tshogs zad par byed pa mo /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bdud kyi tshogs zad par byed pa mo /
translated: She is the one who destroys the hosts of demons of the yogis.

original: mi shes pa rnams kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi tshogs dang byang chub kyi sems kyang zad par byed pa mo /
analyzed: mi shes pa rnams kyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi tshogs dang byang chub kyi sems kyang zad par byed pa mo /
translated: She is the one who destroys the hosts of aggregates, elements, and sense bases of the ignorant, as well as their bodhicitta.

original: byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba las 'chi ba ster pa mo'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba las 'chi ba ster pa mo'o //
translated: She is the one who bestows death from the transference of bodhicitta.

original: de ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam phyag rgya chen po rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam phyag rgya chen po rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
translated: She is Vajrayoginī, the mere appearance of one's own mind, endowed with the supreme of all aspects of the great seal.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang rigs ldan ma dang padma zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid dang rigs ldan ma dang padma zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: She should be called the perfection of wisdom, emptiness, suchness, the one of the family, and the lotus.

original: rigs ldan ma de la mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba 'dzag pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le zla ba zhu ba'i chags pa chen po dbu ma mchog gi dbugs dri dang chu dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rigs ldan ma de la mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba 'dzag pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le zla ba zhu ba'i chags pa chen po dbu ma mchog gi dbugs dri dang chu dang bcas pa /
translated: In that one of the family, the bindu of bodhicitta, the supreme unchanging bliss, the great passion of the melting moon, the supreme central channel, along with breath and moisture,

original: rigs ldan mar yang dag par gyur pa'i thabs des rang gi shes rab de nyid mchod par bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs ldan mar yang dag par gyur pa'i thabs des rang gi shes rab de nyid mchod par bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: By that method of becoming a perfect member of the family, one should worship one's own wisdom.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems dang shes pa dang shes bya dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag gcig @87b pa nyid du rnal 'byor pas bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //🔽rtag tu mchod bya zhes pa dus thams cad du gtsang ba 'am me gtsang ba 'am langs pa 'am 'dug pa 'am gnyid log pa 'am lus dang ngag dang sems bya ba la gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems dang shes pa dang shes bya dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag gcig @87b pa nyid du rnal 'byor pas bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to // rtag tu mchod bya zhes pa dus thams cad du gtsang ba 'am me gtsang ba 'am langs pa 'am 'dug pa 'am gnyid log pa 'am lus dang ngag dang sems bya ba la gnas pa na /
translated: The yogi/ni should make the mind and wisdom, the object and subject, the knower and the known, emptiness and compassion, one.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba la rjes su chags pa phyi rol gyi 'dod pa thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba mchog gi dbang po rnams kyis mthong ba'i yul nye bar longs spyod pa la ma chags pa'o zhes pa dbu
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba la rjes su chags pa phyi rol gyi 'dod pa thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba mchog gi dbang po rnams kyis mthong ba'i yul nye bar longs spyod pa la ma chags pa'o zhes pa dbu
translated: One should always worship means that at all times, whether one is clean or unclean, standing or sitting, asleep or awake, or engaged in physical, verbal, or mental activities, one should be attached to the supreme unchanging bliss, free from the joy of enjoying all external objects of desire, and unattached to the enjoyment of visible objects with the supreme senses.

original: ma'i dbugs kyi rigs ldan ma mchod pa'i cho ga /'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: ma'i dbugs kyi rigs ldan ma mchod pa'i cho ga /'jig rten las 'das pa'i bden pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One has taught the rite of worship of the mother's breath, the consort, by means of the supramundane truth, for the sake of the attainment of the Great Seal.

original: da ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa dang 'khor lo 'dus pa la bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu dang / g-yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa kha na ma thob dang bral ba'am nad kyis shi ba'am las ngan pas bsang ba yang ste /
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa dang 'khor lo 'dus pa la bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu dang / g-yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa kha na ma thob dang bral ba'am nad kyis shi ba'am las ngan pas bsang ba yang ste /
translated: Now, in order to accomplish mundane attainments, the conduct of the messenger, the gathering of the wheel, the pill of the five nectars, and the offering rite of the messengers with the five enjoyments, etc.,

original: go ku da ha na la sogs pa rnams dang / nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa rnams gyis  pho nya mo rnams mchod pa'i cho ga phyi rol dang nang du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: go ku da ha na la sogs pa rnams dang / nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pa rnams gyis  pho nya mo rnams mchod pa'i cho ga phyi rol dang nang du brjod par bya ste /
translated: should be described externally and internally.

original: dus kyi khyad par zhes pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par zhes pa la sogs pas so //
translated: With the special time, etc.

original: 'dir re zhig dus ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'dir re zhig dus ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Here, the time is twofold:

original: phyi rol dang nang du yang ngo ;
analyzed: phyi rol dang nang du yang ngo ;
translated: external and internal.

original: / lo so so dang nyin zhag so sor grangs ji lta bar 'di'i dus kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: / lo so so dang nyin zhag so sor grangs ji lta bar 'di'i dus kyi khyad par te /
translated: The distinctions of time of this [body] are the individual years and individual days and nights, as they are counted.

original: phyi rol dang nang du khyim gyi 'khor lo dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can zhes pa khyad par gyi dus so //
analyzed: phyi rol dang nang du khyim gyi 'khor lo dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can zhes pa khyad par gyi dus so //
translated: The distinctions of time are the external and internal wheel of the house, which has the nature of the twelve two-hour periods.

original: 'dir phyi rol du lo so so'i dus kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol du lo so so'i dus kyi khyad par te /
translated: Here, the distinctions of time of the individual years externally are

original: slar yang nyin zhag rnams dang phyogs dang zla ba dang dus drug dang dus bzhi dang dus gsum dang bgrod pa zhes pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang nyin zhag rnams dang phyogs dang zla ba dang dus drug dang dus bzhi dang dus gsum dang bgrod pa zhes pa'o //
translated: the days and nights again, the directions, the months, the six seasons, the four seasons, the three seasons, and the transits.

original: nang du ni nyin zhag so so'i dus kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: nang du ni nyin zhag so so'i dus kyi khyad par te /
translated: The distinctions of time of the individual days and nights internally are

original: slar yang dbugs rnams dang chu srang dang chu tshod dang yud tsam dang thun phyed dang dus sbyor dang thun dang thun mtshams dang nyin mtshan zhes pa dus kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: slar yang dbugs rnams dang chu srang dang chu tshod dang yud tsam dang thun phyed dang dus sbyor dang thun dang thun mtshams dang nyin mtshan zhes pa dus kyi khyad par ro //
translated: the breaths again, the finger lengths, the hours, the periods, the half periods, the two-hour periods, the periods, the junctions of the periods, and the days and nights.

original: phyi rol du lo so so'i dus gyi  khyad par ni nyin zhag drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya rnams dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang dus drug dang zla ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dus bzhi dang zla ba bzhi'i bdag nyid
analyzed: phyi rol du lo so so'i dus gyi  khyad par ni nyin zhag drug cu lhag pa'i sum brgya rnams dang phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang dus drug dang zla ba gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dus bzhi dang zla ba bzhi'i bdag nyid
translated: Externally, the specific time of each year is the collection of the following:

original: kyi dus gsum dang zla ba drug gi bdag nyid kyi bgrod pa gnyis te 'di rnams kyi tshogs ni @88a * //🔽lo gcig gi dus so //
analyzed: kyi dus gsum dang zla ba drug gi bdag nyid kyi bgrod pa gnyis te 'di rnams kyi tshogs ni @88a * // lo gcig gi dus so //
translated: 360 days, 24 directions, 12 months, 6 seasons, 4 times with the nature of 3 months, 3 times with the nature of 4 months, and 2 paths with the nature of 6 months.🔽Internally, the time of each day is the collection of the following:

original: nang du nyin zhag so so'i dus ni dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams dang / chu srang sum stong drug brgya rnams dang / chu tshod drug cu dang / yud tsam sum cu dang / thun phyed pa bcu drug dang /
analyzed: nang du nyin zhag so so'i dus ni dbugs drug brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams dang / chu srang sum stong drug brgya rnams dang / chu tshod drug cu dang / yud tsam sum cu dang / thun phyed pa bcu drug dang /
translated: 21,600 breaths, 3,600 finger snaps, 60 hours, 30 periods, and 16 half periods.

original: dus sbyor bcu gnyis dang ; thun brgyad dang / thun mtshams bzhi dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams te 'di rnams kyi tshogs ni nyi ma gcig gi dus so //
analyzed: dus sbyor bcu gnyis dang ; thun brgyad dang / thun mtshams bzhi dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams te 'di rnams kyi tshogs ni nyi ma gcig gi dus so //
translated: The twelve two-hour periods, the eight periods, the four junctions, and the day and night—the collection of these is the time of one day.

original: de ltar phyi rol du nyi ma rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du srog rab tu rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol du nyi ma rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du srog rab tu rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par te /
translated: Just as there is a distinction of time by the external movement of the sun, so there is a distinction of time by the internal movement of the life-force.

original: dus kyi khyad par des lo so so'i nyi ma so so la pho nya mo rnams mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par des lo so so'i nyi ma so so la pho nya mo rnams mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: By that distinction of time, the messengers should be worshipped on each day of the year.

original: pho nya mo ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
analyzed: pho nya mo ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa gshin rje 'joms ma'i mthar thug pa sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
translated: The messengers are the yoginīs from Vajraḍāka to Yamāntaka, the thirty-six.

original: de rnams mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: They should be worshipped.

original: 'dir ji ltar pho nya mo rnams mchod pa de bzhin du lhan cig skyes grub rnams te /
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar pho nya mo rnams mchod pa de bzhin du lhan cig skyes grub rnams te /
translated: Here, just as the messengers are worshipped, so are the innately arisen ones.

original: rim pa ma yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog rnams te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams la sa 'og dang sa stengs dang nam mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub ster ba nyid🔽kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ma yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog rnams te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams la sa 'og dang sa stengs dang nam mkha' la spyod pa'i dngos grub ster ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: Since they are not in stages, the twenty-four heroes such as Vajrasattva grant the powers of the lower, middling, and higher [heroes] of the wheels of body, speech, and mind, which are the powers of the subterranean, terrestrial, and celestial [realms].

original: de rnams kyang dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: Since they are the bestowers of those powers, they should be worshipped with the distinctions of time.

original: de ltar pho nya mo rnams dang lhan cig skyes grub rnams bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu dang / go ku da ha na la sogs pa'i sha kha na ma tho ba dang bral ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / nye bar spyod pa lnga po rnams kyis phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang nang du ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo la mchod par bya ste nyi ma rgyu ba dang srog rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: de ltar pho nya mo rnams dang lhan cig skyes grub rnams bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu dang / go ku da ha na la sogs pa'i sha kha na ma tho ba dang bral ba'i dam tshig rnams dang / nye bar spyod pa lnga po rnams kyis phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang nang du ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo la mchod par bya ste nyi ma rgyu ba dang srog rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The special time is the movement of the sun and the movement of the life-force.

original: dus kyi khyad par des pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par des pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The conduct of the messenger is the conduct of the messenger by means of that special time.🔽The conduct of the messenger is enjoyment, union, control, and mastery.

original: pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pas longs spyod pa dang tham pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po nyid de / rigs ldan ma dang pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug po rnams kyi yang rim pa ji lta bas da ltar byung ba'i dus la longs spyod🔽do // ma 'ongs pa'i dus la thim mo //
analyzed: pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pas longs spyod pa dang tham pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po nyid de / rigs ldan ma dang pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug po rnams kyi yang rim pa ji lta bas da ltar byung ba'i dus la longs spyod🔽do // ma 'ongs pa'i dus la thim mo //
translated: The conduct of the messenger is the enjoyment of the present time and the dissolution of the future time of the thirty-six messengers and messenger’s messengers.

original: 'das pa'i dus la dbang byed do //
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus la dbang byed do //
translated: It is the lord of the past.

original: nyi ma 'char ba na longs spyod do //🔽nyi ma phyed pa na dbang byed do //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ba na longs spyod do // nyi ma phyed pa na dbang byed do //
translated: It is the enjoyment at sunrise.🔽It is the lord at noon.

original: nyi ma nub pa'i gnas la bdag po @88b nyid do //
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i gnas la bdag po @88b nyid do //
translated: It is the master at sunset.

original: mtshan phyed pa na nub pa zhes pa rigs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan phyed pa na nub pa zhes pa rigs pa'o //
translated: It is the setting at midnight.

original: de ltar phyi rol du longs spyod pa'i nyin zhag dang nang du longs spyod pa'i dus la rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol du longs spyod pa'i nyin zhag dang nang du longs spyod pa'i dus la rnal 'byor ma'i kun tu spyod pa'o //
translated: Thus, the conduct of the yoginis is the time of enjoyment externally and the time of enjoyment internally.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pas 'khor lo 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pas 'khor lo 'dus pa ste /
translated: The gathering of the wheel is by the conduct of the yoginis.

original: 'khor lo 'dus pas longs spyod pa'i nyin zhag dang longs spyod pa'i dus la mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'dus pas longs spyod pa'i nyin zhag dang longs spyod pa'i dus la mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The worship is at the time of enjoyment and the time of enjoyment of the gathering of the wheel.

original: byis pa'i dus la longs spyod pa dang lang tsho'i dus la dbang byed pa dang / rgan po'i dus la bdag po nyid dang nub par gyur pa'i dus la thim pa ste /
analyzed: byis pa'i dus la longs spyod pa dang lang tsho'i dus la dbang byed pa dang / rgan po'i dus la bdag po nyid dang nub par gyur pa'i dus la thim pa ste /
translated: The enjoyment is in childhood, the lordship is in youth, the mastery is in old age, and the dissolution is at the time of setting.

original: thim pa las slar skye ba byis pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: thim pa las slar skye ba byis pa zhes brjod do //
translated: From the dissolution, there is again birth, which is called childhood.

original: de ltar dus kyi khyad par gyis thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye ba dang / thun brgyad kyi dbye ba dang / phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug po rnams kyis longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po zhes pa thams cad nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar dus kyi khyad par gyis thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye ba dang / thun brgyad kyi dbye ba dang / phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug po rnams kyis longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po zhes pa thams cad nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, by the distinction of time, the division into four sessions, the division into eight sessions, and the division into twenty-four directions, the thirty-six yoginis are enjoyed, dissolved, controlled, and owned, all of which is certain.

original: nga ni mchod pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nga ni mchod pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, I will explain the rite of worship.

original: 'dir phyi rol dang nang du rigs ldan ma rdo rje phag mo bde ba chen po 'gyur ba med pa'i skad cig mas dbu ma mchog gi dbugs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi don du sngags pas dus thams cad du mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol dang nang du rigs ldan ma rdo rje phag mo bde ba chen po 'gyur ba med pa'i skad cig mas dbu ma mchog gi dbugs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi don du sngags pas dus thams cad du mchod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the mantrin should worship Vajravarahi, the goddess of the clan, externally and internally, with the supreme breath of the central channel, by the instant of unchanging great bliss, for the sake of the attainment of the great seal, at all times.

original: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba'i dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba'i dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: For the sake of mundane attainments, the Vajradaka and so forth should be worshipped by the distinctions of time, in the proper sequence.

original: 'dir phyi rol du chu srin gyi 'pho ba la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na bsad pa'i las sgrub pa'i don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol du chu srin gyi 'pho ba la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na bsad pa'i las sgrub pa'i don du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la mchod par bya'o //
translated: Here, when the eastern face appears in the movement of Makara, one should worship Vajraḍāka for the sake of accomplishing the rite of killing.

original: lug gi 'pho ba la g-yas pa'i zhal 'byung ban /
analyzed: lug gi 'pho ba la g-yas pa'i zhal 'byung ban /
translated: When the right face appears in the movement of Mesa,

original: dbang gi las sgrub pa'i don du l'a ma mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang gi las sgrub pa'i don du l'a ma mchod par bya'o //
translated: one should worship Lāmā for the sake of accomplishing the rite of subjugation.

original: karka ta'i 'pho ba la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na rengs pa'i las sgrub pa'i don bu dum skyes ma la mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: karka ta'i 'pho ba la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na rengs pa'i las sgrub pa'i don bu dum skyes ma la mchod par bya'o //
translated: When the western face appears in the movement of Cancer, one should worship Khaṇḍarohā for the sake of accomplishing the rite of immobilization.

original: srang gi 'pho ba la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na zhi ba'i las sgrub pa'i don du gzungs can ma la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: srang gi 'pho ba la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na zhi ba'i las sgrub pa'i don du gzungs can ma la mchod par bya'o zhes pa ste /
translated: When the northern face appears in the movement of Libra, one should worship Dhātvīśvarī for the sake of accomplishing the rite of pacification.

original: 'pho ba'i zla ba gsum gyi mthar nyi ma'i dus la nor dang bu lon 'phel ba dang nyams pa'i dbye bas lo'i dus bzhi'i mtshams so //
analyzed: 'pho ba'i zla ba gsum gyi mthar nyi ma'i dus la nor dang bu lon 'phel ba dang nyams pa'i dbye bas lo'i dus bzhi'i mtshams so //
translated: At the end of the three months of the movement, at the time of the sun, one should know the four times of the year by the increase and decrease of wealth and debt.

original: de rnams kyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po longs spyod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po longs spyod par 'gyur te /
translated: The four dakinis enjoy the days of their transference in the sequence described.

original: thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal gyi dbye bas @89a * //
analyzed: thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal gyi dbye bas @89a * //
translated: The Bhagavān should be understood to be the four dakinis of the four faces of mind, speech, gnosis, and body.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi lha mo rnams bsad pa la sogs pa'i las sgrub pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'i /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi lha mo rnams bsad pa la sogs pa'i las sgrub pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'i /
translated: The goddesses of the east, south, west, and north are to be understood as the four dakinis of the four faces of the Bhagavān for the sake of accomplishing the activities of killing and so on.

original: sa la sogs pa'i khams kyi dbye bas ma yin no zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i khams kyi dbye bas ma yin no zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: They are not to be understood as the divisions of the elements such as earth and so on. This is the definitive meaning.

original: de ltar thams cad du 'chad par 'gyur ba la zhal gyi dbye bas las rab 'byam sgrub pa la lha mchod pa'i nges pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du 'chad par 'gyur ba la zhal gyi dbye bas las rab 'byam sgrub pa la lha mchod pa'i nges pa'o /
translated: Thus, the definitive meaning of the worship of the deities is the accomplishment of the entire range of activities by means of the divisions of the faces, as will be explained.

original: // / da ni dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the worship of the goddesses of the charnel grounds will be explained.

original: 'dir chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la bskrad pa'i don du khva gdong ma dang bum pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la dgug pa'i don du 'ug gdong ma dang / lug gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la phur bus gdab pa'i don du khyi gdong ma dang /🔽glang gi phyed kyi nyin zhag la rgyas pa'i don du phag gdong ma dang / karka ta'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la dug gzhi la ba'i don du gshin rje brtan ma dang / seng ge'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la rmongs pa'i don du gshin rje pho nya mo dang /
analyzed: 'dir chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la bskrad pa'i don du khva gdong ma dang bum pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la dgug pa'i don du 'ug gdong ma dang / lug gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la phur bus gdab pa'i don du khyi gdong ma dang / glang gi phyed kyi nyin zhag la rgyas pa'i don du phag gdong ma dang / karka ta'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la dug gzhi la ba'i don du gshin rje brtan ma dang / seng ge'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la rmongs pa'i don du gshin rje pho nya mo dang /
translated: Here, on the day of the Rahu revolution, one should worship Khagarbha for the purpose of banishing, on the day of the half-water revolution, Uluka for the purpose of summoning, on the day of the Aries revolution, Śvāna for the purpose of striking with a dagger,🔽on the day of the half-bull revolution, Vārāhī for the purpose of enriching, on the day of the Cancer revolution, Yamadhṛg for the purpose of the basis of poison, on the day of the half-lion revolution, Yamadūtī for the purpose of stupefying,

original: srang gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la rengs pa'i don du gshin rje mche ba mo dang / sdig pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la rnam par dbye ba'i don du gshin rje 'joms ma la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: srang gi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la rengs pa'i don du gshin rje mche ba mo dang / sdig pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la rnam par dbye ba'i don du gshin rje 'joms ma la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
translated: on the day of the Libra revolution, Yamadamṣṭrī for the purpose of paralyzing, and on the day of the half-Scorpio revolution, Yamamathanī for the purpose of separating.

original: phyed dang bcas pa phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i bdag nyid kyi lo'i thun brgyad do //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i bdag nyid kyi lo'i thun brgyad do //
translated: The eight periods of the year are of half months and full months.

original: de rnams kyi dang po'i nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor ma brgyad po rnams longs spyod de phyed dang bcas pa phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i ji srid par zhes pa nges pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dang po'i nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor ma brgyad po rnams longs spyod de phyed dang bcas pa phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i ji srid par zhes pa nges pa'o //
translated: In the first days of those, the eight yoginis are enjoyed in the order described, for as long as there are half months and full months.

original: nga ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo'i lha mo rnams mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: nga ni thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo'i lha mo rnams mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now I will describe the worship of the goddesses of the mind, speech, and body wheels.

original: 'dir mgo'i zla ba'i gnam stong la bsad pa'i las sgrub pa'i don du rab gtum ma dang thod pa'i dum bu la'o //
analyzed: 'dir mgo'i zla ba'i gnam stong la bsad pa'i las sgrub pa'i don du rab gtum ma dang thod pa'i dum bu la'o //
translated: Here, on the full moon of the head month, for the sake of accomplishing the killing rite, one should worship Prachaṇḍā and Kapālasundarī.

original: nya la dbang du bya ba'i don du gtum mig ma dang keng rus chen po la'o //
analyzed: nya la dbang du bya ba'i don du gtum mig ma dang keng rus chen po la'o //
translated: On the new moon, for the sake of enthralling, Caṇḍākṣī and Mahākuṇḍalī.

original: rgyal gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la rengs pa'i don du 'od ldan ma dang keng rus can la'o //
analyzed: rgyal gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la rengs pa'i don du 'od ldan ma dang keng rus can la'o //
translated: On the full moon of the conquest month, for the sake of paralyzing, one should worship Prabhāvatī and Aṭṭahāsinī.

original: nya la rgyas pa'i don du sna chen ma dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa la'o //🔽mchu'i zla ba'i gnam stong la zhi ba'i don du dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang chang dgra la'o //
analyzed: nya la rgyas pa'i don du sna chen ma dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa la'o // mchu'i zla ba'i gnam stong la zhi ba'i don du dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang chang dgra la'o //
translated: For the purpose of expansion, on the full moon of Caitra, the Great-nosed One and the Fanged One.🔽For the purpose of pacification, on the full moon of Māgha, the Heroic One and the Enemy of Wine.

original: nya la rmongs pa'i don du mi'u thung ma dang 'od dpag med la'o //
analyzed: nya la rmongs pa'i don du mi'u thung ma dang 'od dpag med la'o //
translated: For the purpose of stupefying, on the full moon of Vaiśākha, the Dwarf and the Infinite Light.

original: dbo'i zla ba'i gnam stong la dgug pa'i don du lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang @89b rdo rje'i 'od la'o //
analyzed: dbo'i zla ba'i gnam stong la dgug pa'i don du lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang @89b rdo rje'i 'od la'o //
translated: For the purpose of summoning, on the full moon of Āṣāḍha, the Queen of Laṅkā and the Vajra Light.🔽For the purpose of separating, on the full moon of Āśvayuja, the Tree Shade and the Vajra Body.

original: nya la rnam par dbye ba'i don du shing grib ma dang rdo rje sku la'o zhes pa mgo'i zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po rnams
analyzed: nya la rnam par dbye ba'i don du shing grib ma dang rdo rje sku la'o zhes pa mgo'i zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po rnams
translated: Thus, on the four months beginning with the head, on the days of the eight directions, the eight heroines and heroines of power are

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
translated: enjoyed in the mind wheel.

original: da ni gsung gi 'khor lo la mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gsung gi 'khor lo la mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the worship in the speech wheel should be stated.

original: 'dir nag pa'i zla ba'i gnam stong la bskrad pa'i don du sa srungs ma dang myu gu can la'o //🔽nya la kun du gdung ba'i don du 'jigs byed chen mo dang rdo rje ral pa can la'o //🔽sa ga'i zla ba'i gnam stong la sde rengs pa'i don du rlung shugs ma dang dpa' bo chen po la'o //
analyzed: 'dir nag pa'i zla ba'i gnam stong la bskrad pa'i don du sa srungs ma dang myu gu can la'o // nya la kun du gdung ba'i don du 'jigs byed chen mo dang rdo rje ral pa can la'o // sa ga'i zla ba'i gnam stong la sde rengs pa'i don du rlung shugs ma dang dpa' bo chen po la'o //
translated: Here, on the full moon of the dark month, for the purpose of banishing, to Sthirapāṇi and Aṅkuramaṇi.🔽On the full moon of the month of Jyeṣṭha, for the purpose of tormenting, to Mahābhairavā and Vajrāṭṭahāsa.🔽On the full moon of Āṣāḍha, for the purpose of paralyzing the army, to Māruta and Mahāvīra.

original: nya la sprin gyi char dbab pa'i don du chang 'thung ma dang rdo rje h'um mdzad la'o //
analyzed: nya la sprin gyi char dbab pa'i don du chang 'thung ma dang rdo rje h'um mdzad la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Śrāvaṇa, for the purpose of causing a rain of clouds, to Surābhakṣi and Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: snron gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la rims nye bar zhi ba'i don du lha mo sgo bsangs ma dang rab tu bzang po la'o //🔽nya las 'og 'byed pa'i don du shin tu bzang mo dang rdo rje bzang po la'o //
analyzed: snron gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la rims nye bar zhi ba'i don du lha mo sgo bsangs ma dang rab tu bzang po la'o // nya las 'og 'byed pa'i don du shin tu bzang mo dang rdo rje bzang po la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Āṣāḍha, for the purpose of pacifying a fever, to Devī and Suśobhana.🔽On the full moon of Āṣāḍha, for the purpose of opening the lower orifices, to Suśobhanā and Vajrasuci.

original: chu stod kyi zla ba'i gnam stong la dbab pa'i don du rta rnam dang 'jigs byed chen po la'o //
analyzed: chu stod kyi zla ba'i gnam stong la dbab pa'i don du rta rnam dang 'jigs byed chen po la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Kārttika, for the purpose of causing rain, to Hayakārī and Mahābhairava.

original: nya la sprin rnam par 'joms pa'i don du mkha' 'gro bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang la'o zhes pa nag pa'i zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi'i phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pa dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug
analyzed: nya la sprin rnam par 'joms pa'i don du mkha' 'gro bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang la'o zhes pa nag pa'i zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi'i phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pa dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug
translated: On the eighth day of the four months beginning with the dark lunar fortnight of Āṣāḍha, one should worship the eight heroines, the heroines’ lords, and the eight mothers, in the order stated, on the days of the eight directions of the four months beginning with the dark lunar fortnight of Āṣāḍha, for the sake of destroying the clouds, for the sake of the ḍākinī with a bird face and for the sake of Virūpākṣa.

original: ma brgyad po rnams gsung gi 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
analyzed: ma brgyad po rnams gsung gi 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
translated: They enjoy the wheel of speech.

original: da ni sku'i 'khor lo la mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni sku'i 'khor lo la mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the worship of the body wheel should be stated.

original: 'dir gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la ral gri chen po sgrub pa'i don du 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang stobs po che la'o //🔽nya la klu'i bu mo dbang du bya ba'i don du dum skyes ma dang rin chen rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: 'dir gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la ral gri chen po sgrub pa'i don du 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang stobs po che la'o // nya la klu'i bu mo dbang du bya ba'i don du dum skyes ma dang rin chen rdo rje la'o //
translated: Here, on the full moon of Śrāvaṇa, for the sake of accomplishing the great sword, one should worship Cakravegā and Mahābala.🔽On the full moon of Āṣāḍha, for the sake of subjugating the nāga maidens, one should worship Khaṇḍarohā and Ratnavajra.

original: khrums kyi zla ba'i gnam stong la klu'i rgyal po rengs par bya ba'i don du shoondi ni dang rta mgrin la'o //
analyzed: khrums kyi zla ba'i gnam stong la klu'i rgyal po rengs par bya ba'i don du shoondi ni dang rta mgrin la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Bhadrapada, for the sake of paralyzing the nāga kings, one should worship Śauṇḍinī and Hayagrīva.

original: nya la ro chen po sgrub pa'i don du 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang nam mkha'i snying po la'o //
analyzed: nya la ro chen po sgrub pa'i don du 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang nam mkha'i snying po la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Aṣāḍha, for the sake of achieving great power, with Cakravarmiṇī and Ākāśagarbha.

original: tha skar gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i don du rab tu dpa' mo dang dang he ru ka la'o //
analyzed: tha skar gyi zla ba'i gnam stong la bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i don du rab tu dpa' mo dang dang he ru ka la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Śravaṇa, for the sake of achieving nectar, with Pradhānaśūī and Heruka.

original: nya la rdzas kyi gter sgrub pa'i don du stobs chen ma dang padma gar gyi dbang phyug la'o //🔽smin drug gi zla ba'i gnam stong la rin po che sgrub pa'i @90a * //
analyzed: nya la rdzas kyi gter sgrub pa'i don du stobs chen ma dang padma gar gyi dbang phyug la'o // smin drug gi zla ba'i gnam stong la rin po che sgrub pa'i @90a * //
translated: On the full moon of Bhadrapada, for the sake of achieving a treasure of substances, with Mahābalā and Padmanarteśvara.

original: don du 'khor los sgyur ma dang rnam par snang mdzad la'o //
analyzed: don du 'khor los sgyur ma dang rnam par snang mdzad la'o //
translated: On the full moon of Āśvina, for the sake of achieving jewels, with Cakravartinī and Vairocana.🔽On the full moon of Kārttika, for the sake of achieving the three worlds, with Mahāvīryā and Vajrasattva.

original: nya la 'jig rten gsum 'dra ba'i don du brtson 'grus chen mo dang rdo rje sems dpa' la'o zhes ba gro bzhin gyi zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi'i phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
analyzed: nya la 'jig rten gsum 'dra ba'i don du brtson 'grus chen mo dang rdo rje sems dpa' la'o zhes ba gro bzhin gyi zla ba la sogs pa zla ba bzhi'i phyogs brgyad kyi nyin zhag rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
translated: Thus, on the eight days of the four months beginning with Śravaṇa, one should perform the hero and heroine ablutions in the manner described.

original: phyug ma brgyad po rnams sku'i 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
analyzed: phyug ma brgyad po rnams sku'i 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
translated: The eight heroines enjoy the body wheel.

original: yang na sdig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang sdig pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag dang / gzhu'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang gzhu'i phyed dang chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang chu srin gyi phyed dang bum pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang bum pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag ste nyin zhag brgyad po rnams la dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad
analyzed: yang na sdig pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang sdig pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag dang / gzhu'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang gzhu'i phyed dang chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang chu srin gyi phyed dang bum pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin zhag dang bum pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag ste nyin zhag brgyad po rnams la dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad
translated: Alternatively, the eight days of the movement of Scorpio, the eight half-days of the movement of Scorpio, the eight days of the movement of Sagittarius, the eight half-days of the movement of Sagittarius, the eight days of the movement of Capricorn, the eight half-days of the movement of Capricorn, the eight days of the movement of Aquarius, and the eight half-days of the movement of Aquarius are the eight days of the movement of the eight heroines and the eight heroines.

original: po rnams thugs kyi 'khor lor longs spyod do //
analyzed: po rnams thugs kyi 'khor lor longs spyod do //
translated: They enjoy the mind wheel.

original: de ltar nya'i 'pho ba dang nya'i phyed dang / lug gi 'pho ba dang lug gi phyed dang / glang gi 'pho ba dang glang gi phyed dang / 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba dang 'khrig pa'i phyed de /
analyzed: de ltar nya'i 'pho ba dang nya'i phyed dang / lug gi 'pho ba dang lug gi phyed dang / glang gi 'pho ba dang glang gi phyed dang / 'khrig pa'i 'pho ba dang 'khrig pa'i phyed de /
translated: Thus, the movement of the full moon and the half-moon, the movement of Aries and the half-movement of Aries, the movement of Taurus and the half-movement of Taurus, and the movement of Gemini and the half-movement of Gemini are the eight movements of the eight heroines and the eight heroines.

original: nyin zhag brgyad po 'di rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po rnams gsung gi 'khor lor longs spyod do //
analyzed: nyin zhag brgyad po 'di rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po rnams gsung gi 'khor lor longs spyod do //
translated: During these eight days, the eight heroines, heroines of the heroes, enjoy the wheel of speech in the order described.

original: de bzhin du karka ta'i 'pho ba dang / karka ta'i phyed dang / seng ge'i 'pho ba dang seng ge'i phyed dang / bu mo'i 'pho ba dang bu mo'i phyed dang / srang gi 'pho ba dang srang gi phyed de nyin zhag brgyad po 'di rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po 'di rnams sku'i 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du karka ta'i 'pho ba dang / karka ta'i phyed dang / seng ge'i 'pho ba dang seng ge'i phyed dang / bu mo'i 'pho ba dang bu mo'i phyed dang / srang gi 'pho ba dang srang gi phyed de nyin zhag brgyad po 'di rnams la ji ltar brjod pa'i rim pas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma brgyad po 'di rnams sku'i 'khor lo la longs spyod do //
translated: Similarly, during the Cancer transit, the Cancer half, the Leo transit, the Leo half, the Virgo transit, the Virgo half, and the Libra transit, the eight heroines, heroines of the heroes, enjoy the wheel of body in the order described.

original: 'dir rab byung la sogs pa lo gsum gsum gyi rab tu dbye bas da ltar ba ni thog ma'i lor gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rab byung la sogs pa lo gsum gsum gyi rab tu dbye bas da ltar ba ni thog ma'i lor gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the present is taken as the first year by the division of three years for the monk and so on.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:🔽The monk, the arisen, the white,

original: rab byung rnam byung dkar po dang // rab myos skyes bdag aanggi ra //
analyzed: rab byung rnam byung dkar po dang // rab myos skyes bdag aanggi ra //
translated: the intoxicated, the lord, the aṅgīra,

original: dpal gdong dngos po na tshod ldan //
analyzed: dpal gdong dngos po na tshod ldan //
translated: Śrīmukha, Vṛddha, and Bhāva,

original: 'dzin byed dbang phyug 'bru mang po ;
analyzed: 'dzin byed dbang phyug 'bru mang po ;
translated: Graha, Īśvara, and Bahubīja,

original: / myos ldan dpa' bo khyu mchog dang // sna tshogs nyi ma nyi sgrol byed //
analyzed: / myos ldan dpa' bo khyu mchog dang // sna tshogs nyi ma nyi sgrol byed //
translated: Madhu, Vīra, Ṛṣabha, and Citrabhānu, Sūryamokṣa,

original: sa skyong mi zad thams cad 'dul //
analyzed: sa skyong mi zad thams cad 'dul //
translated: Bhūpāla, Akṣaya, and Sarvadamana,

original: kun 'dzin 'gal ba rnam 'gyur dang // bong bu dga' ba rnam rgyal nyid //
analyzed: kun 'dzin 'gal ba rnam 'gyur dang // bong bu dga' ba rnam rgyal nyid //
translated: Sarvādhyakṣa, Viruddha, Vikṛta, and Khara, Nanda, Vijaya,🔽Jina, Madhu, Durmukha, Suvarṇa, and Valgu, Vikarman, Sarvānveṣa, Jvalana, Śubhakṛt,🔽Vibhūṣaṇa, Krodha, Citra, and Dhanada, Abhibhu, Mārjara, and Śakuni,

original: rgyal ba myos byed gdong ngan dang // gser 'phyang rnam 'phyang sgyur byed dang // kun ldan @90b 'bar ba dge byed dang // mdzes byed khro mo sna tshogs dbyig / zil gnon spre'u phur bu dang // zhi ba thun mong 'gal byed dang // yongs 'dzin bag yod kun dga' dang //
analyzed: rgyal ba myos byed gdong ngan dang // gser 'phyang rnam 'phyang sgyur byed dang // kun ldan @90b 'bar ba dge byed dang // mdzes byed khro mo sna tshogs dbyig / zil gnon spre'u phur bu dang // zhi ba thun mong 'gal byed dang // yongs 'dzin bag yod kun dga' dang //
translated: Śiva, Sādhāraṇa, and Virūdhaka, Adhyakṣa, Āptakṛt, and Nanda,

original: srin bu me dang dmar ser can //
analyzed: srin bu me dang dmar ser can //
translated: Kṛmī, Agni, and Raktapīta,

original: dus kyi pho nya don grub drag / blo ngan rnga chen khrag skyugs pa //
analyzed: dus kyi pho nya don grub drag / blo ngan rnga chen khrag skyugs pa //
translated: Kāla, Dūta, Siddharudra, and Durmati, Mahābheri, and Rakṣodgāra,

original: mig dmar khro bo zad pa'o //
analyzed: mig dmar khro bo zad pa'o //
translated: Lohitākṣa, and Krodha, Kṣaya.

original: zhes pa lo skor drug gcu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lo skor drug gcu'o //
translated: These are the sixty years.

original: lo gsum po de rnams la slar dang po'i lo la yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: lo gsum po de rnams la slar dang po'i lo la yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Those three years should be taken again as the first year, divided into the three qualities.

original: de la dang po'i lo la lha mo bzhi'i ming dang lhan cig zhal bzhi'i sngags zla ba gsum gsum gyi dbye bas bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dang po'i lo la lha mo bzhi'i ming dang lhan cig zhal bzhi'i sngags zla ba gsum gsum gyi dbye bas bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Therein, in the first year, one should recite the mantra of the four faces together with the names of the four goddesses, divided into three months.

original: de nas lo gnyis pa la rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi ming dang lhan cig rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dbye bas bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lo gnyis pa la rnal 'byor ma brgyad kyi ming dang lhan cig rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba'i dbye bas bzlas par bya'o //
