analyzed: gri ha de wa tar bdag po nyid do zhes 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa longs spyod pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: This is the enjoyment of the gathering and the neighboring gathering, turning to the right.

original: dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo la karka ta 'char ba dang / karka ta'i phyed dang seng ge 'char ba dang seng ge'i phyed la phyi rol du 'khor lo 'dus pa na sku'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo la karka ta 'char ba dang / karka ta'i phyed dang seng ge 'char ba dang seng ge'i phyed la phyi rol du 'khor lo 'dus pa na sku'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: When Cancer rises in the head cakra of the body, and when half of Cancer and Leo rise, and half of Leo, the external gathering of the cakra is the conduct of the yoginīs of the body cakra.

original: 'dir gang gi tshe na ga rar longs spyod pa de'i tshe sindhur thim mo //
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe na ga rar longs spyod pa de'i tshe sindhur thim mo //
translated: Here, when it is enjoyed in Nagara, it dissolves into Sindhu.

original: ku lu tar dbang byed do //
analyzed: ku lu tar dbang byed do //
translated: In Kuluta, he rules.

original: ma rur bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: ma rur bdag po nyid do //
translated: In Maru, he is the lord.

original: de ltar sindhur longs spyod do //
analyzed: de ltar sindhur longs spyod do //
translated: Thus, in Sindhu, he enjoys.

original: ma rur thim mo //
analyzed: ma rur thim mo //
translated: In Maru, he dissolves.

original: na ga rar dbang byed do //
analyzed: na ga rar dbang byed do //
translated: In Nagara, he rules.

original: ku lu tar bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: ku lu tar bdag po nyid do //
translated: In Kuluta, he is the lord.

original: ma rur longs spyod do //
analyzed: ma rur longs spyod do //
translated: In Maru, he enjoys.

original: ku lu tar thim mo //
analyzed: ku lu tar thim mo //
translated: In Kuluta, he dissolves.

original: sindhur dbang byed do //
analyzed: sindhur dbang byed do //
translated: In Sindhu, he rules.

original: na ga rar bdag bo nyid do //
analyzed: na ga rar bdag bo nyid do //
translated: In Nagara, he is the lord.

original: ku lu tar longs spyod do //🔽na ga rar thim mo //
analyzed: ku lu tar longs spyod do // na ga rar thim mo //
translated: In Kuluta, he enjoys.🔽In Nagara, he dissolves.

original: ma rur dbang byed do //
analyzed: ma rur dbang byed do //
translated: In Maru, he rules.🔽In Sindhu, he is the lord.

original: sindhur bdag po nyid do zhes pa dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod longs spyod pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: sindhur bdag po nyid do zhes pa dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod longs spyod pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: This is the enjoyment of the charnel grounds and the neighboring charnel grounds in the counterclockwise direction.

original: bu mo 'char ba dang bu mo'i phyed dang @96b srang 'char ba dang srang gi phyed la dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo la phyi rol du 'khor lo 'dus pa na rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: bu mo 'char ba dang bu mo'i phyed dang @96b srang 'char ba dang srang gi phyed la dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo la phyi rol du 'khor lo 'dus pa na rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa ste /
translated: When the wheel gathers externally in the body wheel in the forehead during the ascendance of the daughter and half of the daughter and the ascendance of the scales and half of the scales, it is the conduct of the yoginīs.

original: rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams 'khor lo gsum la sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi phyed phyed kyi dbye bas dus kyi khyad par la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams 'khor lo gsum la sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi phyed phyed kyi dbye bas dus kyi khyad par la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: These twenty-four yoginis experience the special times of the three wheels, by the division of the twelve half-periods of the day, beginning with the period of sin.

original: 'dir gang gi tshe rtse mos 'bigs par longs spyod pa de'i tshe ro bsreg par thim mo //
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe rtse mos 'bigs par longs spyod pa de'i tshe ro bsreg par thim mo //
translated: Here, when the tip pierces, it experiences the cremation ground.

original: rnag gi drir dbang byed do //
analyzed: rnag gi drir dbang byed do //
translated: It dominates the smell of pus.

original: rul pa'i drir bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: rul pa'i drir bdag po nyid do //
translated: It is the lord of the smell of decay.

original: de ltar ro bsreg par longs spyod do //
analyzed: de ltar ro bsreg par longs spyod do //
translated: Thus it experiences the cremation ground.

original: rul pa'i drir thim mo //
analyzed: rul pa'i drir thim mo //
translated: It dissolves into the smell of pus.

original: rtse mos 'bigs par dbang byed do //
analyzed: rtse mos 'bigs par dbang byed do //
translated: It dominates the tip piercing.

original: rnag gi drir bdag po nyid do //🔽rul pa'i drir longs spyod do //🔽rnag gi drir thim mo //
analyzed: rnag gi drir bdag po nyid do // rul pa'i drir longs spyod do // rnag gi drir thim mo //
translated: It is the lord of the smell of pus.🔽It experiences the smell of decay.🔽It dissolves into the smell of pus.

original: ro bsreg par dbang byed do //
analyzed: ro bsreg par dbang byed do //
translated: It dominates the cremation ground.

original: rtse mos 'bigs par bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: rtse mos 'bigs par bdag po nyid do //
translated: It is the lord of the tip piercing.

original: rnag gi drir longs spyod do //
analyzed: rnag gi drir longs spyod do //
translated: It experiences the smell of pus.

original: rtse mos 'bigs par thim mo //
analyzed: rtse mos 'bigs par thim mo //
translated: It dissolves into the tip piercing.

original: rul pa'i drir dbang byed do //
analyzed: rul pa'i drir dbang byed do //
translated: It dominates the smell of decay.

original: ro bsreg par bdag po nyid do zhes pa phyogs kyi dur khrod chen po longs spyod pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: ro bsreg par bdag po nyid do zhes pa phyogs kyi dur khrod chen po longs spyod pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: The lord of the cremation ground is the enjoyment of the great cremation ground of the directions, proceeding clockwise.

original: mtshan phyed nas thun dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa rang bzhin pa la khva la sogs pa sgo bzhi po rnams dang phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan phyed nas thun dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa rang bzhin pa la khva la sogs pa sgo bzhi po rnams dang phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: From midnight on, the first, second, and third watches are natural, and the four doors of the crow and so on are the external gaṇacakra, the conduct of the yoginīs.

original: 'dir gang gi tshe byis pa shi bar longs spyod pa de'i tshe sbrul gyis zos par thim mo //
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe byis pa shi bar longs spyod pa de'i tshe sbrul gyis zos par thim mo //
translated: Here, when one enjoys the death of a child, one dissolves into the one who is swallowed by the snake.

original: lhag ma za bar dbang byed do //
analyzed: lhag ma za bar dbang byed do //
translated: The lord of the one who eats the remainder is the one who rules.

original: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du bdag po nyid do //
translated: The lord of the battle is the one who enjoys.

original: de ltar sprul gyis zos par longs spyod do //
analyzed: de ltar sprul gyis zos par longs spyod do //
translated: Thus, one enjoys the one who is swallowed by the snake.

original: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du thim mo //
analyzed: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du thim mo //
translated: The lord of the battle is the one who dissolves.

original: byis pa shi bar dbang byed do //
analyzed: byis pa shi bar dbang byed do //
translated: The lord of the death of a child is the one who rules.

original: lhag ma za bar bdag po nyid do //🔽mi bzad pa'i g-yul du longs spyod do //
analyzed: lhag ma za bar bdag po nyid do // mi bzad pa'i g-yul du longs spyod do //
translated: The lord of the one who eats the remainder is the one who enjoys.🔽 The lord of the battle is the one who dissolves.

original: lhag ma za bar thim mo //
analyzed: lhag ma za bar thim mo //
translated: The lord of the one who eats the remainder is the one who enjoys.

original: sprul gyis zos par dbang byed do //
analyzed: sprul gyis zos par dbang byed do //
translated: The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.

original: byis pa shi bar bdag po nyid do //
analyzed: byis pa shi bar bdag po nyid do //
translated: The child is the lord of the one who dies.

original: lhag ma za bar longs spyod do //
analyzed: lhag ma za bar longs spyod do //
translated: The remainder is the enjoyment.

original: byis pa shi bar thim mo //
analyzed: byis pa shi bar thim mo //
translated: The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.

original: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du dbang byed do //
analyzed: mi bzad pa'i g-yul du dbang byed do //
translated: The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.

original: sprul gyis zos par bdag po nyid do zhes pa mtshams kyi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: sprul gyis zos par bdag po nyid do zhes pa mtshams kyi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.

original: nyi ma phyed dang thun dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa las /
analyzed: nyi ma phyed dang thun dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa las /
translated: The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.

original: rna ba g-yon pa la sogs pa sgo bzhi po rnams la dur khrod chen por rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa la sogs pa sgo bzhi po rnams la dur khrod chen por rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.

original: phyi rol du @97a * //
analyzed: phyi rol du @97a * //
translated: The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.

original: 'khor lo 'dus pa dang nang du khva la sogs pa sgo brgyad po rnams la /
analyzed: 'khor lo 'dus pa dang nang du khva la sogs pa sgo brgyad po rnams la /
translated: The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.

original: thun brgyad kyi dbye bas dus kyi khyad par gyis kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: thun brgyad kyi dbye bas dus kyi khyad par gyis kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is the enjoyment.🔽The child is the dissolution of the one who dies.🔽The nāga is the lord of the one who is devoured by the snake.🔽The child is the lord of the one who dies.🔽The remainder is

original: de ltar phyi rol dang nang du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol dang nang du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Thus, there are two kinds of conduct of the yoginis, external and internal.

original: gcig ni shar la sogs pa thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal bzhi'i dbye bas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba dang / gzhan ni sku dang ye shes dang gsung dang thugs kyi zhal gyi dbye bas phyogs bral rnams su g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: gcig ni shar la sogs pa thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal bzhi'i dbye bas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba dang / gzhan ni sku dang ye shes dang gsung dang thugs kyi zhal gyi dbye bas phyogs bral rnams su g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba'o //
translated: One is the clockwise rotation in the directions east, etc., by way of the divisions of the faces of mind, speech, intuition, and body, and the other is the counterclockwise rotation in the directions of the intermediate points by way of the divisions of the faces of body, intuition, speech, and mind.

original: 'dir ye shes kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab ma dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi shar dang me'i rtsibs rnams dang / shar dang me'i dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni thugs kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis bsad pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ye shes kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab ma dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi shar dang me'i rtsibs rnams dang / shar dang me'i dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni thugs kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis bsad pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the eastern petal of the intuition lotus, and the eastern and southeast spokes of the mind, speech, and body wheels, and the east and southeast great charnel grounds, are the bestowers of the powers of the actions of killing, etc., by way of the nature of the face of mind.

original: de ltar lho'i 'dab ma dang lho dang bden bral gyi rtsibs rnams dang / lho dang bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni gsung gi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar lho'i 'dab ma dang lho dang bden bral gyi rtsibs rnams dang / lho dang bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni gsung gi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the enjoyment on the southern petal, the southern and south-west spokes, and in the great charnel ground of the south and south-west, is the accomplishment of the activities of magnetizing and so forth, which is the nature of the face of speech.

original: de ltar nub kyi 'dab ma dang nub dang rlung gi rtsibs rnams dang / nub dang rlung gi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar nub kyi 'dab ma dang nub dang rlung gi rtsibs rnams dang / nub dang rlung gi dur khrod chen por longs spyod pa ni /
translated: Thus, the enjoyment on the western petal, the western and north-west spokes, and in the great charnel ground of the west and north-west,

original: ye shes kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis rengs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis rengs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: is the accomplishment of the activities of paralyzing and so forth, which is the nature of the face of exalted wisdom.

original: de bzhin du byang gi 'dab ma dang byang dang dbang ldan gyi rtsibs rnams dang byang dang dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen bor longs spyod pa ni sku'i zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub sngar brjod pa rnams ster bar 'gyur
analyzed: de bzhin du byang gi 'dab ma dang byang dang dbang ldan gyi rtsibs rnams dang byang dang dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen bor longs spyod pa ni sku'i zhal gyi rang bzhin gyis zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub sngar brjod pa rnams ster bar 'gyur
translated: Similarly, the enjoyment on the northern petal, the northern and north-east spokes, and in the great charnel ground of the north and north-east, is the accomplishment of the activities of pacifying and so forth, which is the nature of the face of the body.

original: ro // 'di rnams rlung dang me dang dbang chen dang chu'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
analyzed: ro // 'di rnams rlung dang me dang dbang chen dang chu'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
translated: These are the maṇḍalas of wind, fire, great earth, and water,🔽arisen from the syllable vaṃ, located at the heart, throat, navel, and forehead, respectively, above their own petals.

original: yar la wa'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba snying ga dang mgrin pa dang lte ba dang dpral bar rim pa ji lta bas rang rang gi rtsibs kyi steng du gnas pa rnams rtogs par bya'o zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi'i dbye bas 'di🔽rnams kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: yar la wa'i yi ge las yang dag par byung ba snying ga dang mgrin pa dang lte ba dang dpral bar rim pa ji lta bas rang rang gi rtsibs kyi steng du gnas pa rnams rtogs par bya'o zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi'i dbye bas 'di rnams kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: These are the conduct of the four faces of the Bhagavān.

original: nyi ma dang srog kun du rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par te dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: nyi ma dang srog kun du rgyu bas dus kyi khyad par te dus kyi khyad par gyis mchod pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: The conduct is by the movement of the sun and life-force, the distinction of time, and by the distinction of time, the rite of worship.

original: de ltar thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du rnal @97b 'byor ma'i tshad dang / dus kyi khyad par gyis kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du rnal @97b 'byor ma'i tshad dang / dus kyi khyad par gyis kun du spyod pa ste /
translated: Thus, everywhere in the Yoginī Tantras, the conduct of the yoginīs is by the distinction of time and the measure of the yoginīs.

original: sgyu ma chen mo las rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams kyi thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas kun du spyod do //
analyzed: sgyu ma chen mo las rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams kyi thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas kun du spyod do //
translated: In the Mahāmāyā, the four yoginīs conduct by the distinction of the four periods.

original: gang na rnal 'byor ma brgyad yod pa der thun brgyad kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na rnal 'byor ma brgyad yod pa der thun brgyad kyi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are eight yoginis, there is a division of eight periods.

original: gang na bcu drug yod pa der thun phyed kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na bcu drug yod pa der thun phyed kyi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are sixteen, there is a division of half periods.

original: gang na sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa der chu tshod kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa der chu tshod kyi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are thirty-two, there is a division of hours.

original: gang na drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa der dbyu gu'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa der dbyu gu'i dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are sixty-four, there is a division of ghatis.

original: gang na bco lnga yod pa der tshes bco lnga'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na bco lnga yod pa der tshes bco lnga'i dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are fifteen, there is a division of the fifteen lunar days.

original: gang na bcu gnyis yod pa der dus sbyor gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na bcu gnyis yod pa der dus sbyor gyi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are twelve, there is a division of the twelve houses.

original: gang na nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa der dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa der dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are twenty-four, there is a division of half houses.

original: gang na drug yod pa der dus drug gi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na drug yod pa der dus drug gi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are six, there is a division of the six times.

original: gang na gsum yod pa der dus gsum gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na gsum yod pa der dus gsum gyi dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are three, there is a division of the three times.

original: gang na gnyis yod pa der bgrod pa'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: gang na gnyis yod pa der bgrod pa'i dbye bas so //
translated: Where there are two, there is a division of the two paths.

original: gang na gcig yod pa der kun du spyod pa med do //
analyzed: gang na gcig yod pa der kun du spyod pa med do //
translated: Where there is one, there is no conduct.

original: 'dir thams cad du dus kyi dbye bas srog kun du rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad du dus kyi dbye bas srog kun du rgyu'o //
translated: Here, the life force moves everywhere by the division of time.

original: srog kun du rgyu bas sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas dus kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: srog kun du rgyu bas sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas dus kyi khyad par ro //
translated: By the various divisions of the life-force moving everywhere, there is the distinction of time.

original: dus kyi khyad par des thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams la pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi khyad par des thams cad du rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams la pho nya mo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: By that distinction of time, everywhere in the Yoginī Tantras, there is the conduct of the messenger.

original: kun du spyod pa'i dbang gis longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po nyid do zhes pa thams cad du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa'i dbang gis longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang dbang byed pa dang bdag po nyid do zhes pa thams cad du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: By the power of conduct, there is enjoyment, dissolution, control, and mastery. All of this should be understood everywhere.

original: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rigs ldan ma dang pho nya mo rnams kyi gnas las gnas kun du rgyu ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rigs ldan ma dang pho nya mo rnams kyi gnas las gnas kun du rgyu ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, from the abode of the messenger and the one endowed with the clan in the wheel of the gaṇa, the movement everywhere in the abodes will be described.

original: de la tshes gcig gi mtshan phyed na shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na dbus nas bdag po'i gnas las rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de la tshes gcig gi mtshan phyed na shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na dbus nas bdag po'i gnas las rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
translated: There, at midnight on the first day, when the eastern face arises, from the abode of the lord in the center, Vajravārāhī, endowed with the clan, moves everywhere in the eastern petal.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni bdag po'i gnas su rigs ldan mar gyur te /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni bdag po'i gnas su rigs ldan mar gyur te /
translated: Vajradākinī, in the abode of the lord, becomes endowed with the clan.

original: gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur la /
translated: By the power of the location, that which is the Vajra dakini becomes the Vajra family lady.

original: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is Vajravarahi becomes the Vajra dakini.

original: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma ni lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma ni lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the morning session, when the southern face arises, the Vajra dakini of the Vajra family moves to the southern petal from the central lord's location.

original: l'a ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: l'a ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Lama moves to the central lord's location.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gad yin ba de ni @98a * //🔽l'a mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gad yin ba de ni @98a * // l'a mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, that which is the Vajra dakini of the Vajra family becomes Lama.

original: l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is Lama becomes the Vajra dakini of the Vajra family.

original: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams na nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las l'a ma rigs ldan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams na nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las l'a ma rigs ldan ma ni nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the midday session, when the western face arises, Lama of the Vajra family moves to the western petal from the central lord's location.

original: dum skyes ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o ;
analyzed: dum skyes ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o ;
translated: The Vajra Sow is in the middle place of the Lord.

original: / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kulaka of the Vajra Sow becomes the Vajra Sow,

original: dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the Vajra Sow becomes the Kulaka.

original: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma ni byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma ni byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the middle of the night, when the northern face arises, the Kulaka of the Vajra Sow moves to the northern petal from the middle place of the Lord.

original: gzugs can ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The Rūpiṇī is in the middle place of the Lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kulaka of the Vajra Sow becomes the Rūpiṇī,

original: gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the Rūpiṇī becomes the Kulaka.

original: slar yang nyin zhag gnyis pa la gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
analyzed: slar yang nyin zhag gnyis pa la gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
translated: Again, on the second day, the Rūpiṇī Kulaka and so forth move.

original: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las /
analyzed: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas las /
translated: In the session break at midnight, when the eastern face arises, Rūpiṇī, the Kṣatriya woman, moves from the central lord’s place

original: shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: to the eastern petal. Vajravārāhī, the ḍākinī, is in the central lord’s place.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Rūpiṇī becomes Vajraḍāka,

original: rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo mkha' 'gro ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Vajravārāhī, the ḍākinī, becomes the Kṣatriya woman.

original: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the session break at dawn, Vajravārāhī, the Kṣatriya woman, moves

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o ;🔽/ de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo ni l'a mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o ; / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo ni l'a mar 'gyur la /
translated: to the southern petal. Vajraḍāka, the Ḍākinī, is in the central lord’s place.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajravārāhī becomes Lāmā,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Vajraḍāka, the Ḍākinī, becomes the Kṣatriya woman.

original: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the evening session, the Vajra dakini, the Lāmā, the Kṣāntivādinī, and the Rūpiṇī are engaged in the western petal.

original: l'a ma dum skyes ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: l'a ma dum skyes ma ni dbus kyi bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The Lāmā, the Khaṇḍarohā, is in the central abode of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the abode, the Vajra dakini, the Lāmā, the Kṣāntivādinī, becomes the Khaṇḍarohā.

original: l'a ma dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: l'a ma dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Lāmā, the Khaṇḍarohā, becomes the Kṣāntivādinī.

original: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la l'a ma dum skyes ma rigs @98b ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la l'a ma dum skyes ma rigs @98b ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the night session, the Lāmā, the Khaṇḍarohā, the Kṣāntivādinī, and the Rūpiṇī are engaged in the northern petal.

original: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
translated: The Khaṇḍarohā, the Rūpiṇī, is in the central abode of the lord.🔽Therefore, by the power of the abode, the Lāmā, the Khaṇḍarohā, the Kṣāntivādinī, becomes the Rūpiṇī.

original: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Khaṇḍarohā, the Rūpiṇī, becomes the Kṣāntivādinī.

original: de nas nyin zhag gsum pa la dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag gsum pa la dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, on the third day and night, one should practice with Cundā, Rūpiṇī, and so on.

original: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: There, at the juncture of midnight, the eastern face arises.

original: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: dum skyes ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Cundā, Rūpiṇī, and Rūpavati practice together on the eastern petal.

original: gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Rūpiṇī Vajraḍāka is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Cundā, Rūpiṇī, and Rūpavati become Vajraḍāka, and Rūpiṇī Vajraḍāka becomes Rūpavati.

original: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams lho'i zhal 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams lho'i zhal 'byung ba ni /
translated: Then, at the juncture of dawn, the southern face arises.

original: gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Rūpiṇī Vajraḍāka, Rūpavati, and Cundā practice together on the southern petal.

original: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī Lāmā is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de l'a mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de l'a mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Vajraḍāka, who is the Lāmā of Vajravārāhī, becomes the Rūpiṇī.

original: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Rūpiṇī of Vajravārāhī becomes the Lāmā.

original: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, at the juncture of noon, the western face arises.

original: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: The Rūpiṇī of Vajravārāhī, who is the Lāmā, moves to the western petal.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The Vajraḍāka, who is the Khaṇḍarohā, is in the center, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo l'a ma rigs ldan ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo l'a ma rigs ldan ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Rūpiṇī of Vajravārāhī, who is the Lāmā, becomes the Khaṇḍarohā.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Khaṇḍarohā, who is the Vajraḍāka, becomes the Rūpiṇī.

original: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba /
analyzed: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba /
translated: Then, at the juncture of the afternoon, the northern face arises.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: The Khaṇḍarohā, who is the Vajraḍāka, moves to the northern petal.

original: l'a ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: l'a ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The form of Lāma is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajraḍākinī is Khaṇḍarohā, and Kaulini is Rūpiṇī.

original: l'a ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar @99a * //
analyzed: l'a ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar @99a * //
translated: And Lāma is Rūpiṇī, and Rūpiṇī is Kaulini.

original: 'gyur ro // de nas nyin zhag bzhi pa la l'a ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // de nas nyin zhag bzhi pa la l'a ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, on the fourth day, Lāma, Kaulini, and so forth, are practiced.

original: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de la mtshan phyed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: There, at the juncture of midnight, when the eastern face arises,

original: l'a ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: l'a ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Lāma, Rūpiṇī, and Kaulini are practiced on the eastern petal,

original: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: and Khaṇḍarohā and Vajraḍākinī are in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Lāma, Rūpiṇī, and Kaulini are Vajraḍākinī,

original: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Khaṇḍarohā, Vajraḍākinī, and Kaulini are Rūpiṇī.

original: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, in the morning session, when the southern face arises,

original: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Caṇḍālī, Vajraḍākinī, and Kulāṭī move to the southern petal.

analyzed: gzugs can ma l'a ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Rūpiṇī and Lāmā are in the center, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma ni l'a mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma ni l'a mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Caṇḍālī, Vajraḍākinī, and Kulāṭī become Lāmā,

original: gzugs can ma l'a ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: gzugs can ma l'a ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro ;
translated: and Rūpiṇī and Lāmā become Kulāṭī.

original: / de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: / de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, in the afternoon session, when the western face arises,

original: gzugs can ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: gzugs can ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Rūpiṇī and Lāmā move to the western petal.

original: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī and Caṇḍālī are in the center, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma l'a ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Rūpiṇī and Lāmā, who are Kulāṭī, become Caṇḍālī,🔽and Vajravārāhī and Caṇḍālī become Rūpiṇī.

original: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Vajravarahi who is Khaganadha becomes the Kulaka.

original: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, in the last part of the night, when the northern face arises,

original: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: the Vajravarahi who is Khaganadha, the Kulaka, moves to the northern petal.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Vajraghanta, Rupika, is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Vajravarahi who is Khaganadha becomes Rupika,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the Vajraghanta who is Rupika becomes the Kulaka.

original: de nas nyin zhag lnga pa la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag lnga pa la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma la sogs pa kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, on the fifth day, the Vajraghanta, the Kulaka, and so forth move.

original: de la mtshan byed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de la mtshan byed kyi thun mtshams la shar gyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: There, in the last part of the night, when the eastern face arises,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gzugs can ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: The Vajraḍāka moves about on the eastern petal as the Kuleśvarī Bhairavī.

original: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag @99b po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni dbus su bdag @99b po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The Ḍākinī Vajraḍāka is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gang yin pa de l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, she who is the Vajraḍāka becomes the Ḍākinī, the Khaṇḍarohā, the Rūpiṇī, and the Kuleśvarī.

original: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su rdzogs pa dang po la rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su rdzogs pa dang po la rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar 'gyur la /
translated: Again, in her own place, she is the Vajraḍāka in the first completion.

original: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Ḍākinī Vajraḍāka becomes the Kuleśvarī.

original: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas snga dro'i thun mtshams la lho'i zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, in the morning session, when the southern face arises,

original: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: l'a ma rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rigs ldan ma lho'i 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: the Kuleśvarī Vajraḍāka moves about on the southern petal as the Rūpiṇī.

original: dum skyes ma l'a ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: dum skyes ma l'a ma ni dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: The Khaṇḍarohā Vajraḍāka is in the middle, in the place of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma gang yin pa de dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rigs ldan mar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis l'a ma gang yin pa de dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang rigs ldan mar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, she who is Lāmā becomes Khaṇḍarohā, Rūpiṇī, Vajraḍāka, and Kulā.

original: slar yang de nyid kyi gnas su l'a mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: slar yang de nyid kyi gnas su l'a mar 'gyur la /
translated: Again, in her own place, she becomes Lāmā.

original: dum skyes ma l'a ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum skyes ma l'a ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Khaṇḍarohā Lāmā becomes Kulā.

original: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma gung gi thun mtshams la nub kyi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, at the juncture of noon, the western face arises.

original: dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: Khaṇḍarohā Kulā moves to the western petal.

original: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Rūpiṇī Khaṇḍarohā is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma gang yin pa de gzugs can ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dum skyes ma gang yin pa de gzugs can ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, she who is Khaṇḍarohā becomes Rūpiṇī, Vajraḍāka, Lāmā, and Kulā.

original: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su dum skyes mar 'gyur la /
translated: Again, in her own place, she becomes Khaṇḍarohā.

original: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Rūpiṇī Khaṇḍarohā becomes Kulā.

original: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na /
analyzed: de nas phyi 'phred kyi thun mtshams la byang gi zhal 'byung ba na /
translated: Then, in the outer square, when the northern face arises in the session break,

original: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
analyzed: gzugs can ma dum skyes ma rigs ldan ma byang gi 'dab ma la kun du spyod de /
translated: the Vajraḍāka, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī move about on the northern petal.

original: rdo rje phag mo gzugs can ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gzugs can ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gzugs can ma gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang rigs ldan mar gyur nas /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, the one who is Rūpiṇī becomes Vajraḍāka, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī,

original: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su gzugs can mar 'gyur la /
translated: and again she becomes Rūpiṇī in her own place.

original: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can mar gyur nas /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang dum skyes ma dang gzugs can mar gyur nas /
translated: The one who is Vajravārāhī becomes Vajraḍāka, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī,

original: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang de nyid rang gi gnas su rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and again she becomes Rūpiṇī in her own place.

original: de ltar nyin zhag lnga pa la thun mtshams nyi shu rnams la rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs par byang chub pa yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin zhag lnga pa la thun mtshams nyi shu rnams la rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs par byang chub pa yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: Thus, in the five-day rite, the twenty-four-hour period is completed by the twenty aspects of the wheel of perfect awakening.

original: 'di ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i kun du spyod pa ste /
translated: This is the conduct of Vajravarahi and so forth.

original: dga' ba @100a * //
analyzed: dga' ba @100a * //
translated: Joy,

original: dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa tshes gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa zhes pa'i tshes kyi dbye ba dang / zla ba'i cha lnga'i rang bzhin dang dang po'i dga' ba'i dbye bas shes ba'o //
analyzed: dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa tshes gcig pa dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa zhes pa'i tshes kyi dbye ba dang / zla ba'i cha lnga'i rang bzhin dang dang po'i dga' ba'i dbye bas shes ba'o //
translated: good, victory, emptiness, and perfection are the divisions of the lunar days, the first, second, third, fourth, and fifth, and the nature of the five parts of the moon, and the divisions of the first joy.

original: de ltar tshes gcig ji lta ba de ltar drug pa dang gnyis pa ji lta ba de ltar bdun pa dang gsum pa ji lta ba de ltar brgyad pa dang bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar dgu pa dang lnga pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu pa
analyzed: de ltar tshes gcig ji lta ba de ltar drug pa dang gnyis pa ji lta ba de ltar bdun pa dang gsum pa ji lta ba de ltar brgyad pa dang bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar dgu pa dang lnga pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu pa
translated: Just as it is for the first, so it is for the sixth, and just as it is for the second, so it is for the seventh, and just as it is for the third, so it is for the eighth, and just as it is for the fourth, so it is for the ninth, and just as it is for the fifth, so it is for the tenth.

original: la kun du spyod de mchog dga'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: la kun du spyod de mchog dga'i dbye bas so //
translated: One should practice in this way, by the divisions of supreme joy.

original: de ltar drug pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gcig pa dang bdun pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gnyis pa dang / brgyad pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gsum pa dang dgu pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu bzhi pa dang / bcu pa ji lta ba de ltar nya la kun du spyod de dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: de ltar drug pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gcig pa dang bdun pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gnyis pa dang / brgyad pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu gsum pa dang dgu pa ji lta ba de ltar bcu bzhi pa dang / bcu pa ji lta ba de ltar nya la kun du spyod de dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dbye bas so //
translated: Just as in the sixth, so in the eleventh; just as in the seventh, so in the twelfth; just as in the eighth, so in the thirteenth; just as in the ninth, so in the fourteenth; just as in the tenth, so in the fifteenth.

original: de'i mthar mchod pa chen po bya ste /
analyzed: de'i mthar mchod pa chen po bya ste /
translated: At the end of that, one should perform the great worship.

original: phyogs dang po la rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang po la rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the conduct of all yoginis in the first part.

original: de nas gnyis pa nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de khva gdong ma dang dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: de nas gnyis pa nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de khva gdong ma dang dbus su bdag po'i gnas su'o //
translated: Then, on the first day of the dark fortnight, at midnight, in the first watch, one should practice in the eastern charnel ground of the Kulaka, with the crow-faced one in the center, in the abode of the lord.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kulaka becomes the crow-faced one.

original: khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the one who is the crow-faced one becomes the Kulaka.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the second period, the crow-faced one, the Kṣatriya, practices in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The owl-faced one is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la 'ug gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la 'ug gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the crow-faced one, the Kṣatriya, becomes the owl-faced one, and the owl-faced one becomes the Kṣatriya.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the third period, the owl-faced one, the Kṣatriya, practices in the great charnel ground of the west.

original: khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The dog-faced one is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the owl-faced one, the Kṣatriya, becomes the dog-faced one,

original: khyi gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the dog-faced one becomes the Kṣatriya.

original: de nas thun bzhi ba la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi ba la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the fourth period, the dog-faced one, the Kṣatriya, practices in the great charnel ground of the north.

original: phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The pig-faced one is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Kṛtā, the dog-faced one, becomes Vārāhī, the pig-faced one.

original: phag gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: phag gdong ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: Vārāhā, the pig-faced one, becomes Kṛtā, the dog-faced one.

original: nyi ma'i cha la thun bzhi'i dbye bas kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i cha la thun bzhi'i dbye bas kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the clockwise order of the four periods of the day, divided into four periods.

original: de nas zla ba'i @100b cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i @100b cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the lunar part, from noon to the first period, Vārāhī, the pig-faced one, Kṛtā, the dog-faced one, practices in the great charnel ground of Iśāna.

original: gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Yamadūtī is in the center.

original: gshin rje brtan ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vārāhī, the pig-faced one, becomes Yamadūtī, and Yamadūtī becomes Vārāhī, the pig-faced one.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, Yamadūtī, the dog-faced one, practices in the great charnel ground of Vāyu.

original: gshin rje pho nya mo ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya mo ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamadamstrini is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mor 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mor 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yakshini of Yama becomes the Yakshini of Yama's Messenger.

original: gshin rje pho nya mo gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya mo gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is the Yakshini of Yama's Messenger becomes the Yakshini of the Lineage.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third watch, the Yakshini of Yama's Messenger of the Lineage wanders in the great charnel ground of the southwest.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Yakshini of Yama's Fangs is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la ;
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la ;
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yakshini of Yama's Messenger of the Lineage becomes the Yakshini of Yama's Fangs.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is the Yakshini of Yama's Fangs becomes the Yakshini of the Lineage.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the fourth watch, the Yakshini of Yama's Fangs of the Lineage wanders in the great charnel ground of the southeast.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Yakshini of Yama's Destruction is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yakshini of Yama's Fangs of the Lineage becomes the Yakshini of Yama's Destruction.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: She who is Yamini becomes Vajravarnani. This is the counter-clockwise cycle, the conduct of the yoginis on the lunar portion.

original: de ltar nyin zhag dang po la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin zhag dang po la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus one should understand the conduct of the yoginis on the first day.

original: slar yang nyin zhag gnyis pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: slar yang nyin zhag gnyis pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Again, on the second day, from midnight on, in the first period, Yamini, the Vajravarnani, conducts herself in the great charnel ground of the east.

original: rdo rje phag mo khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravarahi, the Khakhasana, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamini, the Vajravarnani, becomes Khakhasana.

original: rdo rje phab mo gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phab mo gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: She who is Vajravarahi becomes Vajravarnani.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, Vajravarahi, the Vajravarnani, conducts herself in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: khva gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Khakhasana, the Ulkakanika, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajravārāhī, the Kṣetrapāla, becomes the owl-faced one.

original: khva gdon @101a * //
analyzed: khva gdon @101a * //
translated: The crow-faced one

original: ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: becomes the Kṣetrapāla, who is the owl-faced one.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, the crow-faced one, the Kṣetrapāla, moves about in the great charnel ground in the west.

original: 'ug gdong ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The owl-faced one and the dog-faced one are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the crow-faced one, the Kṣetrapāla, becomes the dog-faced one.

original: 'ug gdong ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The owl-faced one and the dog-faced one become the Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, the owl-faced one, the Kṣetrapāla, moves about in the great charnel ground in the north.

original: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The dog-faced one and the pig-faced one are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the owl-faced one, the Kṣetrapāla, becomes the pig-faced one.

original: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the clockwise procedure, the conduct in the solar portion.

original: de nas nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, from noon to the first period, the Dog-faced, the Kṣatriṇī, conducts herself in the great charnel ground of Indra.

original: phag gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Pig-faced, the Yāminī, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la phag gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Dog-faced, the Kṣatriṇī, becomes the Yāminī, and whichever is the Pig-faced, the Yāminī, she becomes the Kṣatriṇī.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, the Pig-faced, the Kṣatriṇī, conducts herself in the great charnel ground of Vāyu.

original: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje pho nya mo ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje pho nya mo ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Yāminī, the Dūti, is in the center.

analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /

original: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, Yamari moves about in the great charnel ground of the south,

original: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamāntakī becomes Yamāri,

original: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //

analyzed: @101b de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /

original: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //

original: de nas nyin zhag gsum pa la slar yang mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag gsum pa la slar yang mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the third day, again from midnight, in the first period, Yamadamṣṭrī becomes Kṣetrapāla in the great charnel ground of the east,

analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Yamajihvā, who is Kākāsyā, becomes Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the second period, she practices as the goddess Yamini, the destroyer of Yama, in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: rdo rje phag mo 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravarahi, the owl-faced one, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamini, the destroyer of Yama, becomes the owl-faced one.

original: rdo rje phag mo 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is Vajravarahi, the owl-faced one, becomes Yamini.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the third period, she practices as Yamini, Vajravarahi, in the great charnel ground of the west.

original: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The dog-faced one, the crow-faced one, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /

analyzed: khva gdong ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

analyzed: 'ug gdong ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The owl-faced and pig-faced [goddesses] are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, the crow-faced [goddess] is the Kṣetrapāla-rākṣasī,🔽and the owl-faced [goddess] is the Kṣetrapāla-rākṣasī.

original: 'ug gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the clockwise rotation, the conduct in the solar portion.

analyzed: de nas zla ba'i chal nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the lunar portion, from noon to the first watch, the owl-faced [goddess] is the Kṣetrapāla-rākṣasī in the great cremation ground of Vāyu.

original: khyi gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The dog-faced [goddess] is Yama-dāntī in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, the owl-faced [goddess] is Yama-dāntī,

analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje @102a * //🔽brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kṛiṣṇāsyā family woman becomes the Sūkarāsyā messenger of Yama.

original: phag gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

original: de nas thun gsum pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /

analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

original: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Ghasmarī, the Kṣatriya lady, becomes Yamajihinī,

original: gshin rje pho nya mo gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //

translated: Then, in the fourth day, in the first period from midnight, she practices with Yamadūtī, the Kṣatriya lady, in the great cremation ground of Indra.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //

analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /

analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The pig-faced one, Yamadamṣṭrī, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kṛiṣṇāsyā of the family is the Yamadamṣṭrī,

original: phag gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the Vārāhī who is the Yamadamṣṭrī is the Kṛiṣṇāsyā of the family.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, the Vārāhī of the family wanders about in the great cremation ground of Agni.

original: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Yamadhṛiḍī and the Yamajihvā are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /🔽gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i @103a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la / gshin rje brtan ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i @103a * //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Vārāhī of the family is the Yamajihvā,🔽and the Yamadhṛiḍī who is the Yamajihvā is the Vārāhī of the family.

original: cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the counterclockwise rotation, the conduct of the yoginī in the lunar portion.

original: de nas nyin zhag lnga pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag lnga pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the fifth day and night, from midnight on, in the first period, she moves about in the great charnel ground of the east, as the Yakṣiṇī Dhṛtarāṣṭrī, the messenger of Yama.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The messenger of Yama, Kākāsyā, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yakṣiṇī Dhṛtarāṣṭrī becomes Kākāsyā,

original: gshin rje pho nya ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the messenger of Yama, Kākāsyā, becomes Dhṛtarāṣṭrī.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, she moves about in the great charnel ground of the south, as the Yakṣiṇī Dhṛtarāṣṭrī, the messenger of Yama.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o ;🔽/ de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o ; / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
