translated: The messenger of Yama, Ulūkāsyā, is in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yakṣiṇī Dhṛtarāṣṭrī becomes Ulūkāsyā,

original: gshin rje mche ba ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the messenger of Yama, Ulūkāsyā, becomes Dhṛtarāṣṭrī.

original: de nas thun gsum ba la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum ba la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, she practices as Yamāri-dākinī, the Kṣatriya, in the great charnel ground of the west.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Yamāntaka-dākinī, the Dog-faced, is in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamāri-dākinī, the Kṣatriya, becomes the Dog-faced,

original: gshin rje 'joms ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Yamāntaka-dākinī, the Dog-faced, becomes the Kṣatriya.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, she practices as Yamāntaka-dākinī, the Kṣatriya, in the great charnel ground of the north.

original: rdo rje phag mo phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī, the Pig-faced, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamāntaka-dākinī, the Kṣatriya, becomes the Pig-faced,🔽and Vajravārāhī, the Pig-faced, becomes the Kṣatriya.

original: rdo rje phag mo phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The Vajravarahi who is the face of a sow becomes the Kulaka, in the clockwise direction, on the part of the sun. This is the conduct of the yoginis.

original: de nas zla ba de cha la nyi ma gung dang thun dang po la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba de cha la nyi ma gung dang thun dang po la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on that part of the moon, at noon and the first watch, Vajravarahi, the Kulaka, wanders in the great cemetery of Isana.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The face of a crow, Yamantaka, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brten mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brten mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajravarahi, the Kulaka, becomes Yamantaka.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The face of a crow, Yamantaka, becomes the Kulaka.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second watch, the face of a crow, the Kulaka, wanders in the great cemetery of Marut.

original: 'ug gdong ma @103b gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma @103b gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The face of an owl, the messenger of Yama, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Kāka-mukha-kula-devī becomes Yama-dūti.

original: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Uluka-mukha-Yama-dūti becomes the Kula-devī.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, the Uluka-mukha-kula-devī wanders in the great charnel ground of the south-west.

original: khyi gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o /
analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o /
translated: The Śvāna-mukha-Yama-daṃṣṭrī is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Uluka-mukha-kula-devī becomes the Yama-daṃṣṭrī.

original: khyi gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And the Śvāna-mukha-Yama-daṃṣṭrī becomes the Kula-devī.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ma'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ma'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, the Śvāna-mukha-kula-devī wanders in the great charnel ground of the north-west.

original: phag gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Śūkara-mukha-Yama-mathanī is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the dog-faced one of the Kṣatriya class becomes the destroyer of Yama,🔽and the pig-faced one who is the destroyer of Yama becomes of the Kṣatriya class.

original: phag gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: phag gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the counter-clockwise rotation, the conduct of the yoginī on the lunar portion.

original: de nas nyin zhag drug pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag drug pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the sixth day, from midnight to the first watch, the pig-faced one of the Kṣatriya class conducts herself in the great charnel ground of the east,

original: gshin rje brtan ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: and the crow-faced one who is the steadfast one of Yama is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the pig-faced one of the Kṣatriya class becomes the crow-faced one,

original: gshin rje brten ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje brten ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the crow-faced one who is the steadfast one of Yama becomes of the Kṣatriya class.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second watch, the crow-faced one of the Kṣatriya class conducts herself in the great charnel ground of the south,🔽and the owl-faced one who is the steadfast one of Yama is in the center.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The messenger of Yama, Ulūkhalā, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Sthira, the messenger of Yama, becomes Ulūkhalā,

original: gshin rje pho nya ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and she who is the messenger of Yama, Ulūkhalā, becomes Sthira.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third watch, Sthira, the messenger of Yama, moves about in the great charnel ground in the west.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamadāntī, Śvānavaktrā, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Sthira, the messenger of Yama, becomes Śvānavaktrā,

original: gshin rje mche ba ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //🔽de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur @104a * //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro // de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur @104a * //
translated: and she who is Yamadāntī, Śvānavaktrā, becomes Sthira.

original: khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth watch, Yamadāntī, Sthira, moves about in the great charnel ground in the north.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamamathanī, Śūkarākṣī, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yāminī is Varāhī, and🔽that which is Yāminī is Varāhī.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: Thus, the order is clockwise, the conduct of the yoginī on the solar side.

original: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the lunar side, from noon to the first watch, Yāminī is Varāhī,

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: and Vajravārāhī is Yamadhara, in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yāminī is Yamadhara,

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and that which is Vajravārāhī is Yamadhara.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second watch, Vajravārāhī, the Kṣetrapāla, wanders in the great cemetery of Vāyu.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Kākāsyā and Yamī are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajravārāhī, the Kṣetrapāla, becomes Yamī,

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Kākāsyā, who is Yamī, becomes the Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third watch, Kākāsyā, the Kṣetrapāla, wanders in the great cemetery of Nairṛtī.

original: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Ulūkāsyā and Yamadamṣṭrī are in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, Kākāsyā, the Kṣetrapāla, becomes Yamadamṣṭrī,

original: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Ulūkāsyā, who is Yamadamṣṭrī, becomes the Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the fourth period, the owl-faced one, the one of the Kaulinī clan, practices in the great charnel ground of Agni.

original: khyi gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The dog-faced one, the one who conquers Death, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the owl-faced one, the one of the Kaulinī clan, becomes the one who conquers Death.

original: khyi gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: And the dog-faced one, the one who conquers Death, becomes the one of the Kaulinī clan. This is the counterclockwise rotation, the conduct of the yoginī in the part of the moon.

original: de nas nyin zhag bdun pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag bdun pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the seventh day, in the first period, from midnight, the dog-faced one, the one of the Kaulinī clan, practices in the great charnel ground of the east.

original: phag gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus @104b su'o ;
analyzed: phag gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus @104b su'o ;
translated: The pig-faced one, the crow-faced one, is in the center.

original: / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: / de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the dog-faced one, the one of the Kaulinī clan, becomes the crow-faced one.

original: phag gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phag gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is Vārāhī becomes Kaṇṭhamālinī.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second watch, Vārāhī, Kaṇṭhamālinī, wanders in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: gshin rje brtan ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamadūtī, owl-faced, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vārāhī, Kaṇṭhamālinī, becomes owl-faced.

original: gshin rje brtan ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is Yamadūtī, owl-faced, becomes Kaṇṭhamālinī.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen po kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen po kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third watch, Yamadūtī, Kaṇṭhamālinī, wanders in the great charnel ground of the west.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Yamadaṇḍī, dog-faced, is in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamadūtī, Kaṇṭhamālinī, becomes dog-faced.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is Yamadaṇḍī, dog-faced, becomes Kaṇṭhamālinī.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the fourth period, the messenger of Death, the Kṣatriya, acts in the great charnel ground of the north.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Death Fang, the Pig-Face, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya mo rigs ldan ma ni phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the messenger of Death, the Kṣatriya, becomes the Pig-Face,

original: gshin rje mche ba ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: and that which is the Death Fang, the Pig-Face, becomes the Kṣatriya. This is the clockwise rotation, the conduct of the yoginī in the solar portion.

original: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then in the lunar portion, from noon in the first period, the Death Fang, the Kṣatriya, acts in the great charnel ground of Indra.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Death Conqueror, the Death-Stable, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Death Fang, the Kṣatriya, becomes the Death-Stable,🔽and that which is the Death Conqueror, the Death-Stable, becomes the Kṣatriya.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de ni rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is Yamini and Yamadanti is called Vyañjanika.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, Yamini, who is Vyañjanika, wanders in the great cemetery of Vayu.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī and Yamadūti are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamini, who is Vyañjanika, becomes Yamadūti.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur @105a * //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur @105a * //
translated: The one who is Vajravārāhī and Yamadūti is Vyañjanika.

original: ro ; / de nas thun gsum pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: ro ; / de nas thun gsum pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, Vajravārāhī, who is Vyañjanika, wanders in the great cemetery of Nirṛti.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Kākapāni and Yamadamṣṭrī are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Vajravārāhī, who is Vyañjanika, becomes Yamadamṣṭrī.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is Khakhaḍaṁkāli becomes Rāgiṇī.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, Khakhaḍaṁkāli, the Rāgiṇī, moves about in the Great Cremation Ground of Fire.

original: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The one who is Ulūkhalamukhī, Yamadamstrini, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, Khakhaḍaṁkāli becomes Yamadamstrini.

original: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The one who is Ulūkhalamukhī, Yamadamstrini, becomes Rāgiṇī. This is the counterclockwise rotation, the movement in the part of the moon.

original: de nas nyin zhag brgyad pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag brgyad pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the eighth day, in the first period, from midnight, Ulūkhalamukhī, the Rāgiṇī, moves about in the Great Cremation Ground of the East.

original: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The one who is Śvānamukhī, Khakhaḍaṁkāli, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khva gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, owl-faced is of the family of crow-faced,

original: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and crow-faced is of the family of dog-faced.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, dog-faced is of the family of crow-faced, and they wander in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: phag gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: phag gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Pig-faced and owl-faced are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni 'ug gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, dog-faced is of the family of owl-faced,

original: phag gdong ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phag gdong ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and pig-faced is of the family of owl-faced.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, pig-faced is of the family of owl-faced, and they wander in the great charnel ground of the west.

original: gshin rje brtan ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma khyi gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yāminī is dog-faced and is in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, pig-faced is of the family of dog-faced,

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma ni khyi gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: and dog-faced is of the family of pig-faced.

original: gshin rje brtan ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma khyi gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is the yakṣiṇī Sthira-Yamī becomes the kṣatriya.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, the yakṣiṇī Sthira-Yamī practices in the great cremation ground of the north,

original: gshin rje pho nya ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: and the pig-faced messenger of Yama is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni @105b phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma ni @105b phag gdong mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the kṣatriya Sthira-Yamī becomes the pig-faced one,🔽and that which is the pig-faced messenger of Yama becomes the kṣatriya.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the clockwise practice of the yoginī in the solar period.

original: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the lunar period, from noon in the first period, the kṣatriya messenger of Yama practices in the great cremation ground of Indra.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The lion-faced Yama-dāntī is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje brtan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamadūti becomes Kuleśvarī,

original: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Yamadamṣṭrī, who is Yamadūti, becomes Kuleśvarī.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod do /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod do /
translated: Then, in the second period, Yamadamṣṭrī, who is Kuleśvarī, moves about in the great charnel ground of Vāyu.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamajihva, who is Yamadūti, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje pho nya mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamadamṣṭrī, who is Kuleśvarī, becomes Yamadūti,

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: and Yamajihva, who is Yamadūti, becomes Kuleśvarī.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, Yamajihva, who is Kuleśvarī, moves about in the great charnel ground of Nirṛti.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī, who is Yamadamṣṭrī, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje mche ba mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamini, who is Yamari, becomes Vajravarahi.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that Vajravarahi who is Yamari becomes Yamini.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, Vajravarahi, who is Yamini, wanders in the great cemetery of fire.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: And Khakhahara, who is Yamari, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma ni gshin rje 'joms mar 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamini, who is Vajravarahi, becomes Yamari.🔽And that Khakhahara who is Yamari becomes Yamini.

original: khva gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: khva gdong ma gshin rje 'joms ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the counterclockwise rotation, the conduct of the yoginis on the part of the moon.

original: de nas nyin zhag dgu pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag dgu pa la mtshan phyed nas thun dang po la khva gdong ma rigs ldan ma shar gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, on the ninth day and night, in the first period from midnight, Khakhaḍaṅka, the Kākāsyā, moves in the great charnel ground of the east.

original: 'ug gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'ug gdong ma khva gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Uluḍaṅka, the Ulūkāsyā, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang khva gdong ma nyid du @106a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khva gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang khva gdong ma nyid du @106a * //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Khakhaḍaṅka, the Kākāsyā, becomes the Kuleśī, and so on, and again becomes Khakhaḍaṅka, the Kākāsyā.

original: 'gyur la / 'ug gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur la / 'ug gdong ma khva gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is Uluḍaṅka, the Ulūkāsyā, becomes the Kuleśī.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la 'ug gdong ma rigs ldan ma lho'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second period, Uluḍaṅka, the Ulūkāsyā, moves in the great charnel ground of the south.

original: khyi gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma 'ug gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Śvānaḍaṅka, the Śvānaमुखā, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang 'ug gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'ug gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang 'ug gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Uluḍaṅka, the Ulūkāsyā, becomes the Kuleśī, and so on, and again becomes Uluḍaṅka, the Ulūkāsyā.

original: khyi gdong ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma 'ug gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is the face of a dog or an owl becomes the one of the Kṣatriya caste.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la khyi gdong ma rigs ldan ma nub kyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, the face of a dog, the one of the Kṣatriya caste, moves about in the great charnel ground in the west.

original: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The face of a dog or a pig is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang khyi gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis khyi gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang khyi gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the face of a dog becomes the one of the Kṣatriya caste, and so on, and again becomes the face of a dog.

original: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyi gdong ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is the face of a dog or a pig becomes the one of the Kṣatriya caste.

original: de nas thun bzhi ba la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi ba la phag gdong ma rigs ldan ma byang gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, the face of a pig, the one of the Kṣatriya caste, moves about in the great charnel ground in the north.

original: gshin rje brtan ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma phag gdong ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The face of a pig or Yama is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang 'phag gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis phag gdong ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang 'phag gdong ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the face of a pig becomes the one of the Kṣatriya caste, and so on, and again becomes the face of a pig.

original: gshin rje brtan ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: gshin rje brtan ma phag gdong ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste nyi ma'i cha la kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the clockwise order of the day in the lunar mansion.

original: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i cha la nyi ma gung nas thun dang po la gshin rje brtan ma rigs ldan ma dbang ldan gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the lunar mansion of the moon, from noon until the first watch, Yamadanti moves in the great cemetery of Isana.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje brtan ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Yamadūti is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs par gyur nas slar yang gshin rje brtan ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje brtan ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs par gyur nas slar yang gshin rje brtan ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Yamadanti becomes Vajrakula and so on, and again becomes Yamadanti.

original: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje pho nya ma gshin rje brtan ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan ma nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is called Yamadūti becomes Vajrakula.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la gshin rje pho nya ma rigs ldan ma rlung gi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the second watch, Vajrakula moves in the great cemetery of Vāyu.

original: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gshin rje mche ba ma gshin rje pho nya ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: The Yāminī and Yāminī messengers are in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje pho nya ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje pho nya ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje pho nya ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yāminī messengers become the Kṣetrapāla, and so on, and again become the Yāminī messengers.

original: gshin @106b rje mche ba ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin @106b rje mche ba ma gshin rje pho nya ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Yāminī and Yāminī messengers become the Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ma ldan pa bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la gshin rje mche ba ma rigs ma ldan pa bden bral gyi dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the third period, the Yāminī Kṣetrapāla wanders in the great charnel ground of the Rākṣasa.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o //🔽de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje mche ba ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje mche ba ma ni dbus su'o // de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje mche ba ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje mche ba ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: The Yamadhṛk and Yāminī are in the center.🔽Therefore, by the power of the place, the Yāminī becomes the Kṣetrapāla, and so on, and again becomes the Yāminī.

original: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje 'joms ma gshin rje mche ba ma gang yin pa de rigs ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: The Yamadhṛk and Yāminī become the Kṣetrapāla.

original: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
analyzed: de nas thun bzhi pa la gshin rje 'joms ma rigs ldan ma me'i dur khrod chen por kun du spyod de /
translated: Then, in the fourth period, she practices as Yamini, the destroyer of Yama, in the great charnel ground of Agni.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje 'joms ma ni dbus su'o //
translated: Vajravārāhī, the destroyer of Yama, is in the center.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje 'joms ma nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis gshin rje 'joms ma ni rigs ldan ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas slar yang gshin rje 'joms ma nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the destroyer of Yama becomes Yamini, and so on, and again becomes the destroyer of Yama.

original: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas /🔽slar yang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis rigs ldan ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o zhes pa dur khrod chen po brgyad po rnams su dus
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gang yin pa de khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams su gyur nas / slar yang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis rigs ldan ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste zla ba'i cha la rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas rtogs par bya'o zhes pa dur khrod chen po brgyad po rnams su dus
translated: And that which is Vajravārāhī becomes Kākāsyā, and so on,🔽and again by the power of her own place becomes Yamini.🔽This is the leftward rotation, which the yogin should understand to be the conduct of the yoginīs in the lunar portion.

original: kyi khyad par gyis rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa ste /
analyzed: kyi khyad par gyis rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa ste /
translated: This is the conduct of the yoginīs in the eight great charnel grounds by the special time.

original: nyin zhag dgu pa la rang gi gnas su bgrod pas kun du spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nyin zhag dgu pa la rang gi gnas su bgrod pas kun du spyod pa yongs su spyod pa'o //
translated: On the ninth day, by proceeding to one's own place, one practices the conduct.

original: de nas mchod pa byas nas slar yang nyin zhag bcu pa la tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la ji lta ba bzhin kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas nas slar yang nyin zhag bcu pa la tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la ji lta ba bzhin kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, having made offerings, again on the tenth day, on the first day of the lunar month, one practices as before.

original: gnyis pa ji lta bar bcu gcig pa la'o //🔽gsum pa ji lta bar bcu gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ji lta bar bcu gcig pa la'o // gsum pa ji lta bar bcu gnyis pa la'o //
translated: On the second day, as before, on the eleventh.🔽On the third day, as before, on the twelfth.

original: bzhi pa ji lta bar bcu gsum pa la'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ji lta bar bcu gsum pa la'o //
translated: On the fourth day, as before, on the thirteenth.

original: lnga pa ji lta bar bcu bzhi pa la'o //
analyzed: lnga pa ji lta bar bcu bzhi pa la'o //
translated: On the fifth day, as before, on the fourteenth.

original: drug pa ji lta bar gnam stong la'o //
analyzed: drug pa ji lta bar gnam stong la'o //
translated: On the sixth day, as before, on the thirtieth.

original: bdun pa ji lta bar dkar po'i tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la'o //
analyzed: bdun pa ji lta bar dkar po'i tshes gcig gi nyin zhag la'o //
translated: On the seventh day, as before, on the first day of the bright lunar fortnight.

original: brgyad pa ji lta bar gnyis pa la'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa ji lta bar gnyis pa la'o //
translated: On the eighth day, as before, on the second day.

original: dgu pa ji lta bar gsum pa la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: dgu pa ji lta bar gsum pa la kun du spyod do //
translated: On the ninth day, as before, on the third day, one practices.

original: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas su bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnams slar yang rang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas su bgrod pa'i dbang gis rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnams slar yang rang rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of proceeding to one's own place, Vajravārāhī and so forth again become one's own nature.

original: de nas mchod pa byas nas slar yang bcu pa la ji lta bar bzhi @107a * //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas nas slar yang bcu pa la ji lta bar bzhi @107a * //
translated: Then, having made offerings, he again practices as before, on the tenth day.

original: ba la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: ba la kun du spyod do //
translated: On the fourth day, he practices as on the tenth day.

original: lnga pa la bcu gcig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lnga pa la bcu gcig pa bzhin no //
translated: On the fifth day, he practices as on the eleventh day.

original: drug pa la bcu gnyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: drug pa la bcu gnyis pa bzhin no //
translated: On the sixth day, he practices as on the twelfth day.

original: bdun pa la bcu gsum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bdun pa la bcu gsum pa bzhin no //
translated: On the seventh day, he practices as on the thirteenth day.

original: brgyad pa la bcu bzhi pa bzhin no //
analyzed: brgyad pa la bcu bzhi pa bzhin no //
translated: On the eighth day, he practices as on the fourteenth day.

original: dgu pa la gnam stong bzhin no //🔽bcu pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig bzhin no //
analyzed: dgu pa la gnam stong bzhin no // bcu pa la dkar po'i tshes gcig bzhin no //
translated: On the ninth day, he practices as on the new moon day.🔽On the tenth day, he practices as on the first day of the white fortnight.

original: bcu gcig pa la gnyis pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bcu gcig pa la gnyis pa bzhin no //
translated: On the eleventh day, he practices as on the second day.

original: bcu gnyis pa la gsum pa bzhin te /
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la gsum pa bzhin te /
translated: On the twelfth day, he practices as on the third day.

original: dur khrod na gnas pa rnams kyi thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dbye bas kun du spyod do //
analyzed: dur khrod na gnas pa rnams kyi thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dbye bas kun du spyod do //
translated: Thus, he practices in the charnel ground, distinguishing the mind, speech, and body.

original: de'i phyir nyin zhag dgu rnams kyis rgyu skar dgu'i sbyor bas rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams dang / zla ba'i khyim bcu gnyis mthar thug pa ji srid par ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyin zhag dgu rnams kyis rgyu skar dgu'i sbyor bas rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun rnams dang / zla ba'i khyim bcu gnyis mthar thug pa ji srid par ro //
translated: Thus, by the conjunction of the nine lunar mansions in nine days, the twenty-seven lunar mansions and the twelve lunar months are completed.

original: de ltar cha bco lnga'i dbye bas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis he ru ka dang lhan cig kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de ltar cha bco lnga'i dbye bas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis he ru ka dang lhan cig kun du spyod do //
translated: Thus, by the division into fifteen parts, the dakinis and so forth enjoy together with Heruka.

original: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi dbye bas kun du spyod do ;
analyzed: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi dbye bas kun du spyod do ;
translated: The Khakha-faced and so forth enjoy by the division into twenty-seven lunar mansions.

original: / de nas zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbye bas nyin zhag gsum la rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kun du spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de nas zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbye bas nyin zhag gsum la rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kun du spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by the division into moon and sun, for three days, the Chauri and so forth enjoy.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: 'dir dkar po'i bcu gsum pa sdig pa'i dus sbyor 'char ba na thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs du mchod pa byas nas thabs spangs te rab gtum ma lho'i rtsibs la kun du spyod do //🔽gtum mig ma ni nub kyi rtsibs la'o //
analyzed: 'dir dkar po'i bcu gsum pa sdig pa'i dus sbyor 'char ba na thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs du mchod pa byas nas thabs spangs te rab gtum ma lho'i rtsibs la kun du spyod do // gtum mig ma ni nub kyi rtsibs la'o //
translated: Here, when the white thirteenth day, the time of sin, rises, having made offering to the eastern spoke of the mind wheel, abandoning the method, the Chauri enjoys on the southern spoke.🔽The Chandikas is on the western spoke.

original: 'od ldan ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: 'od ldan ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The Marici is on the northern spoke.

original: sna chen ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: sna chen ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The Maha-nasika is on the eastern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni gtum mig ma dang / gtum mig ma ni 'od ldan ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni sna chen ma dang / sna chen ma ni rab gtum mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni gtum mig ma dang / gtum mig ma ni 'od ldan ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni sna chen ma dang / sna chen ma ni rab gtum mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, Caṇḍī becomes Caṇḍākṣī, Caṇḍākṣī becomes Māmakī, Māmakī becomes Mahānāsā, and Mahānāsā becomes Caṇḍī.

original: de nas sdig pa'i phyed la snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni kun du spyod de nub kyi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i gtum mig ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas sdig pa'i phyed la snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni kun du spyod de nub kyi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i gtum mig ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, at the end of the evil period, the former Caṇḍī is in the western spoke.🔽The former Caṇḍākṣī is in the northern spoke.

original: snga ma'i 'od ldan ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'od ldan ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Māmakī is in the eastern spoke.

original: snga ma'i sna chen ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i sna chen ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Mahānāsā is in the southern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni 'od ldan ma dang / gtum mig ma ni sna chen ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni rab gtum ma dang / sna chen ma ni gtum mig mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni 'od ldan ma dang / gtum mig ma ni sna chen ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni rab gtum ma dang / sna chen ma ni gtum mig mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, Caṇḍī becomes Māmakī, Caṇḍākṣī becomes Mahānāsā, Māmakī becomes Caṇḍī, and Mahānāsā becomes Caṇḍākṣī.

original: de nas gzhu 'char ba na snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni byang gi rtsibs la kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas gzhu 'char ba na snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni byang gi rtsibs la kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, at the rising of the bow, the former Caṇḍī is in the northern spoke.

original: @107b snga ma'i gtum mig ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: @107b snga ma'i gtum mig ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The previous Caṇḍākṣī is on the eastern spoke.

original: snga ma'i 'od ldan ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'od ldan ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: The previous Māmakī is on the southern spoke.

original: snga ma'i sna chen ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i sna chen ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The previous Mahānāsā is on the western spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni sna chen ma dang / gtum mig ma ni rab gtum ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni gtum mig ma dang / sna chen ma ni 'od ldan mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab gtum ma ni sna chen ma dang / gtum mig ma ni rab gtum ma dang / 'od ldan ma ni gtum mig ma dang / sna chen ma ni 'od ldan mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Caṇḍālī becomes Mahānāsā, Caṇḍākṣī becomes Caṇḍālī, Māmakī becomes Caṇḍākṣī, and Mahānāsā becomes Māmakī.

original: de nas gzhu'i phyed la snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽gtum mig ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhu'i phyed la snga ma'i rab gtum ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // gtum mig ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, on the half of the bow, the previous Caṇḍālī is engaged in conduct on the eastern spoke.🔽Caṇḍākṣī is on the southern spoke.

original: 'od ldan ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: 'od ldan ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Māmakī is on the western spoke.

original: sna chen ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun tu spyod do //
analyzed: sna chen ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun tu spyod do //
translated: Mahānāsā is engaged in conduct on the northern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab tu gtum ma la sogs pa'i pho nya mo rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis rab tu gtum ma la sogs pa'i pho nya mo rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the messengers such as Caṇḍālī take on their individual forms.

original: sdig pa 'char ba dang sdig pa'i phyed dang / gzhu 'char ba dang gzhu'i phyed la dbyu gu phyed dang bcas pa'i gnyis gnyis kyi rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa 'char ba dang sdig pa'i phyed dang / gzhu 'char ba dang gzhu'i phyed la dbyu gu phyed dang bcas pa'i gnyis gnyis kyi rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod par shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the four yoginis, the one who rises at dawn, the one who rises at midnight, the one who rises at dusk, and the one who rises at noon, are engaged in the ganacakra ritual in the two [directions] of the one who rises at dawn and half of the one who rises at midnight, and in the two [directions] of the one who rises at dusk and half of the one who rises at noon.

original: de nas chu srin 'char ba nas mchod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de nas chu srin 'char ba nas mchod pa byas nas /
translated: Then, having worshipped from the one who rises at the crocodile [direction],🔽the one with a hero's mind is engaged in the northwest direction.

original: dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni dbang ldan nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽mi'u thung ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni dbang ldan nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // mi'u thung ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The dwarf is engaged in the southwest direction.

original: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: The queen of Lanka is engaged in the southeast direction.

original: shing grib ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: shing grib ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The one in the shade of a tree is engaged in the northeast direction.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni mi'u thung ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni shing grib ma dang / shing grib ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni mi'u thung ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni shing grib ma dang / shing grib ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the hero's wife becomes the dwarf, the dwarf becomes the lady of Lanka, the lady of Lanka becomes the tree-shaded one, and the tree-shaded one becomes the hero's wife.

original: de nas chu srin gyi phyed la snga ma'i dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas chu srin gyi phyed la snga ma'i dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, on the half-crocodile [square], the former hero's wife is engaged in the southwest square,🔽the former dwarf is in the southeast square,

original: snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former lady of Lanka is in the northeast square,

original: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: and the former tree-shaded one is engaged in the northwest square.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni shing grib ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / shing grib ma ni mi'u thung mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni shing grib ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / shing grib ma ni mi'u thung mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the hero's wife becomes the queen of Lanka, the dwarf woman becomes the tree-shade woman, the queen of Lanka becomes the hero's wife, and the tree-shade woman becomes the dwarf woman.

original: de nas bum pa 'char ba na /
analyzed: de nas bum pa 'char ba na /
translated: Then, when the vase arises,

original: snga ma'i dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod @108a * //🔽do ; / snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod @108a * // do ; / snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former hero's wife moves to the fire spoke,🔽the former dwarf woman to the northeast spoke,

original: snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former queen of Lanka to the wind spoke,

original: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: and the former tree-shade woman moves to the southwest spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni shing grib ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni mi'u thung ma dang / shing grib ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni shing grib ma dang / mi'u thung ma ni dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni mi'u thung ma dang / shing grib ma ni lang ka'i dbang phyug mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the hero's wife becomes the tree-shade woman, the dwarf woman becomes the hero's wife, the Kankali woman becomes the dwarf woman, and the tree-shade woman becomes the Kankali woman.

original: de nas bum pa'i phyed la dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas bum pa'i phyed la dpa' bo'i blo can ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i mi'u thung ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, on half of the vase, the hero's wife moves to the northeast petal,🔽the former dwarf woman to the northwest petal,🔽the former Kankali woman to the southwest petal,

original: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod de /
analyzed: snga ma'i shing grib ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod de /
translated: and the former tree-shade woman to the southeast petal.

original: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste chu srin 'char ba dang / chu srin gyi phyed dang /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis dpa' bo'i blo can ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste chu srin 'char ba dang / chu srin gyi phyed dang /
translated: Therefore, the heroines such as the Heroine of the Self-Mastered, etc., take on their own forms by the power of their own places. This is the counterclockwise rotation, the rising of Capricorn and half of Aquarius.

original: bum pa 'char ba dang bum pa'i phyed la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa 'char ba dang bum pa'i phyed la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The heroines practice in the rising of Aquarius and half of Pisces.

original: de ltar dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma brgyad po rnams kyi thugs kyi 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma brgyad po rnams kyi thugs kyi 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the yogis should understand the practice in the wheel of the mind of the eight heroines by the division of the half-periods.

original: de nas mchod pa byas nas gsung gi 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas nas gsung gi 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, having made offerings, the practice in the wheel of speech is as follows.

original: 'dir nya'i dus sbyor 'char ba nas srungs ma ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs nas lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: 'dir nya'i dus sbyor 'char ba nas srungs ma ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs nas lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Here, from the rising of the Capricorn period, the heroine of the east of the wheel of speech practices in the southern spoke.

original: 'jigs byed chen po ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen po ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Mahābhairavā is on the western spoke.

original: rlung shugs ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: rlung shugs ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Mārīcī is on the northern spoke.

original: chang 'thung ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: chang 'thung ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Cūḍā is on the eastern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni 'jigs byed chen mo dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ni rlung shugs ma dang / rlung shugs ma ni chang 'thung ma dang / chang 'thung ma ni sa srungs mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni 'jigs byed chen mo dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ni rlung shugs ma dang / rlung shugs ma ni chang 'thung ma dang / chang 'thung ma ni sa srungs mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Pṛthivī becomes Mahābhairavā, Mahābhairavā becomes Mārīcī, Mārīcī becomes Cūḍā, and Cūḍā becomes Pṛthivī.

original: de nas nya'i phyed la snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas nya'i phyed la snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, at midnight, the previous Pṛthivī is on the western spoke.

original: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni byang gi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The previous Mahābhairavā is on the northern spoke.🔽The previous Mārīcī is on the eastern spoke.

original: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The previous Cūḍā is on the southern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas @108b kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni rlung shugs ma dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ni chang 'thung ma dang / rlung shugs ma ni sa srungs ma dang / chang 'thung ma ni 'jigs byed chen mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas @108b kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni rlung shugs ma dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ni chang 'thung ma dang / rlung shugs ma ni sa srungs ma dang / chang 'thung ma ni 'jigs byed chen mor 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Pṛthivī is Vāyuvegā, Mahābhairavā is Surābhakṣī, Vāyuvegā is Pṛthivī, and Surābhakṣī is Mahābhairavā.

original: de nas lug 'char ba na snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas lug 'char ba na snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, when Aries arises, the former Pṛthivī is in the northern spoke.

original: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Mahābhairavā is in the eastern spoke.🔽The former Vāyuvegā is in the southern spoke.

original: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni nub gyi  rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni nub gyi  rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The former Surābhakṣī is in the western spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni chang 'thung mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma ni chang 'thung mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, Pṛthivī becomes Surābhakṣī,

original: 'jigs byed chen mo ni sa srungs ma dang // rlung shugs ma ni 'jigs byed chen mo dang / chang 'thung ma ni rlung shugs mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs byed chen mo ni sa srungs ma dang // rlung shugs ma ni 'jigs byed chen mo dang / chang 'thung ma ni rlung shugs mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Mahābhairavā becomes Pṛthivī, Vāyuvegā becomes Mahābhairavā, and Surābhakṣī becomes Vāyuvegā.

original: de nas lug gi phyed la snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas lug gi phyed la snga ma'i sa srungs ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, in the half of Aries, Locanā is in the eastern spoke as before.

original: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'jigs byed chen mo ni lho'i rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i rlung shugs ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Mahābhairavā is in the southern spoke as before.🔽Vajravārāhī is in the western spoke as before.

original: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i chang 'thung ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Cundā is in the northern spoke as before.

original: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis sa srungs ma la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: Therefore, by the power of their own places, Locanā and so on take on their own forms, which is the clockwise order.

original: rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams kyi dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas gsung gi 'khor lo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams kyi dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas gsung gi 'khor lo'i kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the conduct of the wheel of awakened speech of the four yoginīs in terms of the division of the half-periods.

original: de nas mchod pa byas nas glang gi dus sbyor 'char ba na /🔽lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas nas glang gi dus sbyor 'char ba na / lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, having made offerings, when the sign of Taurus arises,🔽the goddess Pāṇḍaravāsinī moves from the northeast to the northwest.

original: shin tu bzang mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: shin tu bzang mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Subhadrā moves from the southwest to the southeast.

original: rta rnam ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: rta rnam ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: Horse-face is in the south-east.

original: mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Garland-face is in the north-east.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni shin tu bzang mo dang / shin tu bzang mo ni rta rnam dang / rta rnam ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni lha mo sngo bsangs mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni shin tu bzang mo dang / shin tu bzang mo ni rta rnam dang / rta rnam ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni lha mo sngo bsangs mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of location, the goddess Śyāmā is very good, very good is Horse-face, Horse-face is Garland-face, and Garland-face is the goddess Śyāmā.

original: de nas glang gi phyed la snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas glang gi phyed la snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the second half of the elephant, the former goddess Śyāmā is in the south-west.

original: snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni me'i rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i rta rnam ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni me'i rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i rta rnam ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former very good is in the south-east.🔽The former Horse-face is in the north-east.

original: snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Garland-face is in the north-west.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis @109a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis @109a * //
translated: Therefore, by the power of location, the goddess Śyāmā is very good, very good is Horse-face, Horse-face is Garland-face, and Garland-face is the goddess Śyāmā.

original: lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni rta rnam dang / shin tu bzang mo ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / rta rnam ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni shin tu bzang mor 'gyur ro //🔽de nas 'khrig pa 'char ba na snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni rta rnam dang / shin tu bzang mo ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / rta rnam ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni shin tu bzang mor 'gyur ro // de nas 'khrig pa 'char ba na snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The goddess Śyāmādevī is Hayakarṇī, Suvarcalā is Dākinīmukha, Hayakarṇī is Śyāmādevī, and Dākinīmukha is Suvarcalā.

original: snga ma'i rta rna ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i rta rna ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, when the arousal of passion occurs, the previous Śyāmādevī is in the southern direction, the previous Suvarcalā is in the northeast, the previous Hayakarṇī is in the northwest, and the previous Dākinīmukha is in the southwest.🔽Then, when the arousal of passion occurs, the previous Śyāmādevī is in the southern direction, the previous Suvarcalā is in the northeast, the previous Hayakarṇī is in the northwest, and the previous Dākinīmukha is in the southwest.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / shin tu bzang mo ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / rta rna ma ni shin tu bzang mo dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni rta rna mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni mkha' 'gro gdong ma dang / shin tu bzang mo ni lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / rta rna ma ni shin tu bzang mo dang / mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni rta rna mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, due to the power of the directions, Śyāmādevī becomes Dākinīmukha, Suvarcalā becomes Śyāmādevī, Hayakarṇī becomes Suvarcalā, and Dākinīmukha becomes Hayakarṇī.

original: de nas 'khrig pa'i phyed la snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas 'khrig pa'i phyed la snga ma'i lha mo sngo bsangs ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i shin tu bzang mo ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, in the half of the sexual union, the goddess Śyāmādevī of the previous verse is enjoyed in the northeast corner.🔽The previous Su-bhadrā is in the northwest corner.

original: snga ma'i rta rna ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i rta rna ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The previous Hayakārī is in the southwest corner.

original: snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin bar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste gsung gi 'khor lo la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o
analyzed: snga ma'i mkha' 'gro gdong ma ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do // de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis lha mo sngo bsangs ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin bar 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste gsung gi 'khor lo la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'o
translated: The previous Dākinīvadanā is enjoyed in the southeast corner.🔽Therefore, by the power of their own places, the yoginīs Śyāmādevī and so forth take on their own forms. This is the counterclockwise enjoyment of the yoginīs in the wheel of speech.

original: // de ltar nya la sogs pa dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bo rnams kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: // de ltar nya la sogs pa dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma brgyad bo rnams kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand the enjoyment of the eight yoginīs in the gaṇacakra by the division of the half-union of the lunar mansions Aśvinī and so forth.

original: de nas mchod pa byas nas sku'i 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de nas mchod pa byas nas sku'i 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, having made offerings, the conduct in the body cakra is as follows.

original: 'dir karka ta 'char ba na 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni sku'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs nas lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽dum skyes ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: 'dir karka ta 'char ba na 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni sku'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs nas lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do // dum skyes ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Here, when Cancer arises, Cakravegā moves from the eastern to the southern spoke of the body cakra.🔽Cūḍā moves to the western spoke.

original: shoondi ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: shoondi ni byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Śauṇḍinī moves to the northern spoke.

original: 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Cakravarmiṇī moves to the eastern spoke.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur ro //
