analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, Cakravegā becomes Cūḍā.

original: dum skyes ma ni shoondi ni dang / shoondi ni ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni 'khor lo'i shugs can mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dum skyes ma ni shoondi ni dang / shoondi ni ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni 'khor lo'i shugs can mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Cūḍā becomes Śauṇḍinī, Śauṇḍinī becomes Cakravarmiṇī, and Cakravarmiṇī becomes Cakravegā.

original: de nas karka ta'i phyed la snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs @109b can ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas karka ta'i phyed la snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs @109b can ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the half Cancer, the previous Cakravegā moves to the western spoke.

original: snga ma'i du ma skyes ma mi byang gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i du ma skyes ma mi byang gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Cakravegā is in the northern petal.

original: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Śaṃkhinī is in the eastern petal.

original: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni lho'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The former Cakravarmiṇī is in the southern petal.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni shoondi ni dang / snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / snga ma'i shoondi ni ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni shoondi ni dang / snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / snga ma'i shoondi ni ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni dum skyes mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, the former Cakravegā becomes Śaṃkhinī, the former Khaṇḍarohā becomes Cakravarmiṇī, the former Śaṃkhinī becomes Cakravegā, and the former Cakravarmiṇī becomes Khaṇḍarohā.

original: de nas seng ge'i dus sbyor 'char ba na snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas seng ge'i dus sbyor 'char ba na snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, when the Leo lagna arises, the former Cakravegā is in the northern petal.

original: snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Khaṇḍarohā is in the eastern petal.

original: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: The former Śaṃkhinī is in the southern petal.

original: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni nub kyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The former Cakravarmiṇī is in the western petal.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / snga ma'i shoondi ni ni dum skyes ma dang snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni shoondi nir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / snga ma'i shoondi ni ni dum skyes ma dang snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni shoondi nir 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the place, the former Cakravega becomes Cakravarma, the former Ardhacandra becomes Cakravega, the former Ardhahastaka becomes Ardhacandra, and the former Cakravarma becomes Ardhahastaka.

original: de nas seng ge'i phyed la snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas seng ge'i phyed la snga ma'i 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ni shar gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i dum skyes ma ni lho'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, on the half-lion [face], the former Cakravega is practiced in the eastern spoke,🔽the former Ardhahastaka in the southern spoke,

original: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i shoondi ni ni nub kyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former Ardhacandra in the western spoke,

original: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor lo'i go cha ma ni byang gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: and the former Cakravarma is practiced in the northern spoke.

original: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste sku'i 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur zhes pa g-yas skor gyis 'khor ba ste sku'i 'khor lo la kun du spyod pa'o ;
translated: This is the clockwise procedure, the conduct in the wheel of body.

original: / de nas mchod pa byas nas g-yon skor gyis kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: / de nas mchod pa byas nas g-yon skor gyis kun du spyod pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Then, having made offerings, the counterclockwise procedure is as follows.

original: 'dir bu mo'i dus sbyor 'char ba ni shin tu dpa' mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: 'dir bu mo'i dus sbyor 'char ba ni shin tu dpa' mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs nas rlung gi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Here, when the bhaga mandala arises, Suvīrā conducts herself from the spoke of Indra to the spoke of Vāyu.

original: stobs chen ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: stobs chen ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Mahābalā is on the spoke of Agni.

original: 'khor los sgyur ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: Cakravartinī is on the spoke of Vāyu.

original: brtson 'grus chen mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus chen mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Mahāvīryā conducts herself on the spoke of Indra.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni stobs chen ma dang / stobs chen ma ni 'khor los sgyur ma dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni shin @110a * //🔽tu dpa' mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni stobs chen ma dang / stobs chen ma ni 'khor los sgyur ma dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni shin @110a * // tu dpa' mor 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of location, the very courageous one is the powerful one, the powerful one is the universal monarch, the universal monarch is the great effort one, and the great effort one is the very courageous one.

original: de nas bu mo'i phyed la shin tu dpa' mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas bu mo'i phyed la shin tu dpa' mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, in the half of the daughters, the very courageous one is practiced in the spoke of the Nairṛti direction,

original: snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni me'i rtsibs su'o //
translated: the previous powerful one in the spoke of the fire direction,

original: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the previous universal monarch in the spoke of the Indra direction,

original: snga ma'i brtsan 'grus chen mo ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i brtsan 'grus chen mo ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: and the previous great effort one in the spoke of the wind direction.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni 'khor los sgyur ma dang / stobs chen ma ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni shin tu dpa' mo dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni stobs chen mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni 'khor los sgyur ma dang / stobs chen ma ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni shin tu dpa' mo dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni stobs chen mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of location, the very courageous one is the universal monarch, the powerful one is the great effort one, the universal monarch is the very courageous one, and the great effort one is the powerful one.

original: de nas srang gi dus sbyor 'char ba na snga ma'i shin tu dpa' mo ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //🔽snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: de nas srang gi dus sbyor 'char ba na snga ma'i shin tu dpa' mo ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do // snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: Then, when the Libra āyatanas arise, the former Suvīrā is in the south, the former Mahābalā is in the northeast,

original: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //🔽snga ma'i brtson 'grus chen mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o // snga ma'i brtson 'grus chen mo ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: the former Cakravartinī is in the west, and the former Mahāvīryā is in the northwest.

original: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / stobs chen mo ni shin tu dpa' mo dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni stobs chen ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni 'khor los sgyur mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo ni brtson 'grus chen mo dang / stobs chen mo ni shin tu dpa' mo dang / 'khor los sgyur ma ni stobs chen ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ni 'khor los sgyur mar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the location, Suvīrā becomes Mahāvīryā, Mahābalā becomes Suvīrā, Cakravartinī becomes Mahābalā, and Mahāvīryā becomes Cakravartinī.

original: de nas srang gi phyed la shin tu dpa' mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: de nas srang gi phyed la shin tu dpa' mo ni dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: Then, at the midpoint of Libra, Suvīrā is in the northeast,

original: snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i stobs chen ma ni rlung gi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former Mahābalā is in the west,

original: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i 'khor los sgyur ma ni bden bral gyi rtsibs su'o //
translated: the former Cakravartinī is in the northwest,🔽and the former Mahāvīryā is in the south.

original: snga ma'i brtson 'grus chen mo ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
analyzed: snga ma'i brtson 'grus chen mo ni me'i rtsibs su kun du spyod do //
translated: The former great diligence is practiced on the petal of fire.

original: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rang gi gnas kyi dbang gis shin tu dpa' mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi po rnams rang rang gi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa g-yon skor gyis 'khor ba ste /
translated: Therefore, by the power of their own places, the four yoginis such as Caṇḍālī take on their own forms.

original: bu mo la sogs pa'i dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas sku'i 'khor lo la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bu mo la sogs pa'i dus sbyor phyed pa'i dbye bas sku'i 'khor lo la rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: This is the counterclockwise rotation. One should understand that the yoginis practice the gaṇacakra on the cakra of body by the division of the half-zodiacs beginning with Virgo.

original: de ltar nyin zhag dang po la sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis phyed pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba rnams kyis bcu gsum pa la rnal 'byor ma rnams kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar nyin zhag dang po la sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis phyed pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba rnams kyis bcu gsum pa la rnal 'byor ma rnams kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: Thus, on the first day, the yoginis practice on the thirteenth [half-zodiac] by the division of the twenty-four half-zodiacs of the twelve zodiacs beginning with Virgo.

original: 'dir bcu gsum pa la thugs kyi dbye ba dang mun pa'i yon tan gyi dbye ba ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu bzhi pa la ste /
analyzed: 'dir bcu gsum pa la thugs kyi dbye ba dang mun pa'i yon tan gyi dbye ba ji lta ba de bzhin du bcu bzhi pa la ste /
translated: Here, just as there is a division of the mind and the qualities of darkness on the thirteenth, so too there is on the fourteenth.

original: nyin zhag gnyis pa la gsung @110b gi dbye ba dang / rdul gyi yon tan gyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: nyin zhag gnyis pa la gsung @110b gi dbye ba dang / rdul gyi yon tan gyi dbye bas so //
translated: On the second day, by the division of speech and the division of the quality of rajas.

original: de ltar nya la ste nyin zhag gsum pa la sku'i dbye ba dang / snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i kun du spyod pa sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi phyed pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba rnams kyis tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o
analyzed: de ltar nya la ste nyin zhag gsum pa la sku'i dbye ba dang / snying stobs kyi yon tan gyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i kun du spyod pa sdig pa la sogs pa dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi phyed pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba rnams kyis tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o
translated: Thus, on the third day, by the division of the body and the division of the quality of sattva, the conduct of the twenty-four yoginis should be understood by the yogis in the ganacakra by the divisions of the twenty-four half periods of the twelve double hours, beginning with Kali.

original: zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dus kyi khyad par gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dus kyi khyad par gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi kun du spyod pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the determination of the conduct of the yoginis by the special time of the twenty-four.

original: 'dir rnal 'byor ma gang gnas gang du kun du spyod pa der de'i lhag ma za pa'i dbang gis dang de'i rigs kyi thabs kyis bzung bas de de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor ma gang gnas gang du kun du spyod pa der de'i lhag ma za pa'i dbang gis dang de'i rigs kyi thabs kyis bzung bas de de'i rigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, whatever yoginis conduct themselves in whatever places, by the power of eating their leftovers and being taken by the method of their type, they become of that type.

original: ji srid rang gi gnas su ma phyin pa de srid du rang gi rigs su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid rang gi gnas su ma phyin pa de srid du rang gi rigs su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as one has not gone to one's own place, one is not of one's own class.

original: de nas rang gi gnas su phyin pas rang gi rigs su gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rang gi gnas su phyin pas rang gi rigs su gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, by going to one's own place, one abides in one's own class.

original: 'di ltar dpal he ru kas bzung ba dang rigs ldan ma'i lhag ma za ba'i dbang gis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar gang zhig dbus su zhugs pa de ni rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan mar 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dpal he ru kas bzung ba dang rigs ldan ma'i lhag ma za ba'i dbang gis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma gshin rje 'joms ma'i bar gang zhig dbus su zhugs pa de ni rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan mar 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, by the power of eating the remainder of the glorious Heruka's food and the food of the remaining qakinis, etc., up to the yoginis of Yamari, whoever enters the center becomes a Vajravarahi of the class.

original: rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzhan gyi lhag ma za pa'i dbang gis de'i rigs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma gang yin pa de gzhan gyi lhag ma za pa'i dbang gis de'i rigs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: And whoever is a Vajravarahi of the class becomes of that class by the power of eating the remainder of others.

original: de ltar rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma rnams gnas kyi dbang gis rigs dang mi ldan pa ni rigs dang ldan par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma rnams gnas kyi dbang gis rigs dang mi ldan pa ni rigs dang ldan par 'gyur la /
translated: Thus, by the power of the place, the yoginis of the thirty-six classes become of a class when not of a class,

original: rigs dang ldan pa ni rigs dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs dang ldan pa ni rigs dang mi ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: and those of a class become not of a class.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten kun rdzob tu rigs dang mi ldan pa yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi 'og tu bzhag pas rigs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten kun rdzob tu rigs dang mi ldan pa yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi 'og tu bzhag pas rigs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as in the world, even one who is not of the warrior class becomes a warrior by being placed under the precious parasol of a universal monarch.

original: 'dir sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams khyi sha 'tshed pa la sogs pa mnga' nas byung ba rigs dang mi ldan pa yang sngags dang bsam gtan dang dka' thub kyis stobs dang bram zer 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du rigs dang ldan pa'i bram ze rnams kyang ba lang gi sha la sogs pa zos shing gdol pa la sogs pa rigs dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi khyim du zos pas rigs dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams khyi sha 'tshed pa la sogs pa mnga' nas byung ba rigs dang mi ldan pa yang sngags dang bsam gtan dang dka' thub kyis stobs dang bram zer 'gyur ro // de bzhin du rigs dang ldan pa'i bram ze rnams kyang ba lang gi sha la sogs pa zos shing gdol pa la sogs pa rigs dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi khyim du zos pas rigs dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, even one who is not of the priestly class, by cooking dog meat and so on, becomes a priest through the power of mantra, meditation, and austerity.🔽Similarly, even priestly brahmins who eat beef and so on and eat in the homes of those of non-priestly classes become non-priestly.

original: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa la gzhan gyi @111a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa la gzhan gyi @111a * //
translated: Similarly, in the conduct of yoginis, even a brahmin who eats dog meat and so on becomes a non-brahmin.

original: gnas dang bza' ba dang thabs dang longs spyod pas bzung ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas dang bza' ba dang thabs dang longs spyod pas bzung ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob tu rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis shes par bya ste /
translated: The yoginīs should know the yoginīs by means of the place, the food, the method, and the enjoyment, in the mundane relative.

original: sngar brjod pa'i g-yung mo la sogs pa rigs kyi pho nya mo sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: sngar brjod pa'i g-yung mo la sogs pa rigs kyi pho nya mo sum cu rtsa bdun po rnams tshogs kyi 'khor lor kun du spyod pa'i don du'o //
translated: The thirty-seven messengers of the families, beginning with the ḍākinī, as previously mentioned, are for the purpose of conduct in the gaṇacakra.

original: de ltar ji srid lo gsum gyi bar du mchod pa dang sngags bzlas pa dang bsam gtan bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar ji srid lo gsum gyi bar du mchod pa dang sngags bzlas pa dang bsam gtan bya ste /
translated: Thus, for as long as three years, one should make offerings, recite the mantra, and practice concentration.

original: sngags bzlas pa'i mthar sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa'i mthar sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: At the end of the recitation of the mantra, one should perform the burnt offering.

original: de nas phyogs gsum ji srid par tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kun du spyod par bya'o ;
analyzed: de nas phyogs gsum ji srid par tshogs kyi 'khor lor rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kun du spyod par bya'o ;
translated: Then, for as long as three months, one should conduct oneself in the gaṇacakra with the yoginīs.

original: / de nas sngar brjod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs rgyud las gsungs pa thams cad thams cad kyi tshe rnam pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa po la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de nas sngar brjod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi sgrub thabs rgyud las gsungs pa thams cad thams cad kyi tshe rnam pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa po la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, all the means of achieving the worldly powers mentioned above, as taught in the tantras, will be accomplished for the adept at all times and in every way.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang las gcig gi dngos grub gcig 'grub ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang las gcig gi dngos grub gcig 'grub ste /
translated: And by another method, one power will be achieved by one rite.

original: sngags bzlas pa dang bsam gtan dang sbyin sreg gis shes pa'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa dang bsam gtan dang sbyin sreg gis shes pa'o //
translated: This is known through mantra recitation, meditation, and fire sacrifice.

original: rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur te /
translated: It will not be the chief adept's power,

original: las gcig gis ral gri la sogs pa'i dngos grub gcig 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las gcig gis ral gri la sogs pa'i dngos grub gcig 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: but one power such as the sword will be achieved by one rite.

original: des na dus sbyor gyi khyad par gyi rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dus kyi khyad par gyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: des na dus sbyor gyi khyad par gyi rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum par rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dus kyi khyad par gyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this conduct of the yoginīs according to the distinctions of the junctures should be understood by the yogīs according to the distinctions of time in the Root Tantra, the Hundred Thousand Verse Tantra.

original: yang na / de las byung ba'i 'grel bshad 'dis shes pa ste /
analyzed: yang na / de las byung ba'i 'grel bshad 'dis shes pa ste /
translated: Or, it is known from this commentary that has arisen from that.

original: 'jig rten pa'i las rab 'byam thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad mngon du bya ba'i phyir grub pa chen po nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir yang nges pa'o zhes pa rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i las rab 'byam thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad mngon du bya ba'i phyir grub pa chen po nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir yang nges pa'o zhes pa rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: And definite means that it is also for the sake of accomplishing the great power of the perfection of all mundane and supramundane activities and all powers.

original: da ni gnas kyi ming yig dang po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las phyi rol dang nang du gdan dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni gnas kyi ming yig dang po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las phyi rol dang nang du gdan dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, the name of the place, the seed syllable, and the seat and gaṇacakra both externally and internally should be stated.

original: de la phyi rol du lhun po'i 'og tu ham yig yongs su gyur pa pa las nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de la phyi rol du lhun po'i 'og tu ham yig yongs su gyur pa pa las nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, below Meru, from the transformation of the syllable haṃ, is the maṇḍala of space.

original: nang du ni gtsug tor gyi padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni gtsug tor gyi padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the anthers of the uṣṇīṣa lotus.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du yam yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du yam yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, above that, from the transformation of the syllable yaṃ, is the maṇḍala of air.

original: nang du ni dpral ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni dpral ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the anthers of the forehead lotus.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i @111b dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i @111b dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, above that, from the transformation of the syllable raṃ, is the maṇḍala of fire.

original: nang du ni mgrin pa'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni mgrin pa'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the pistil cup of the lotus of the throat.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, above that, from the transformation of the syllable vaṃ, is the water maṇḍala.

original: nang du ni snying ga'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni snying ga'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the pistil cup of the lotus of the heart.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, above that, from the transformation of the syllable laṃ, is the earth maṇḍala.

original: nang du ni lte ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni lte ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the pistil cup of the navel lotus.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du mam yig yongs su gyur pa las lhun po'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du mam yig yongs su gyur pa las lhun po'o //
translated: Externally, above that, from the transformation of the syllable maṃ, is Meru.

original: nang du ni gsang ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
analyzed: nang du ni gsang ba'i padma'i ze 'bru'o //
translated: Internally, it is the pistil cup of the secret lotus.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du sna tshogs padma'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du sna tshogs padma'o //
translated: Externally, above that, is a multicolored lotus.

original: nang du ni rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i rtsa brgyad ze 'bru dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i rtsa brgyad ze 'bru dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Internally, it is the eight channels that enter the vajra jewel, along with the pistil cup.

original: phyi rol du padma'i ze 'bru la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi rol du padma'i ze 'bru la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Externally, it is the sun maṇḍala on the pistil cup of the lotus.

original: nang du ni dus kyi me'o //
analyzed: nang du ni dus kyi me'o //
translated: Internally, it is the fire of time.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du au ma dang / dbang phyug chen po'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du au ma dang / dbang phyug chen po'o //
translated: Externally, above that, is Umā and Maheśvara.

original: nang du ni rdul dang khu ba'o //
analyzed: nang du ni rdul dang khu ba'o //
translated: Internally, it is the ovum and sperm.

original: phyi rol du de'i steng du he ru ka'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du de'i steng du he ru ka'o //
translated: Externally, on top of that, is Heruka.

original: nang du ni de dag 'gog pa las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: nang du ni de dag 'gog pa las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: Internally, that is the simultaneously-born joy from the cessation of those.

original: rdo rje phag mo ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de dang / 'od zer dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / zla ba'i 'od ltar dbyer med pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de dang / 'od zer dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / zla ba'i 'od ltar dbyer med pa'i chos can no //
translated: Vajravārāhī is omniscience, which is inseparable from the quality of the light, the radiance, the moon, and the moonlight.

original: de ltar lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo rje nor bur sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo rje nor bur sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the simultaneously-born joy of the phenomena of body, speech, and mind at the navel, the secret place, and the vajra jewel should be called the Bhagavān Śrī Heruka.

original: 'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni ye shes rdo rje bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni ye shes rdo rje bzhi pa'o //
translated: Here, the simultaneously-born joy is the fourth exalted wisdom vajra.

original: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das he ru ka zhal bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das he ru ka zhal bzhi pa ste /
translated: Thus, the Bhagavān Heruka has four faces.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: He is the nature of body, speech, mind, and exalted wisdom.

original: zhal bzhi po de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis byang dang lho dang shar dang nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams su gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug po de rnams kyi rang rang gi gnas kyi ming gi yi ge dang po yongs su gyur pa las🔽ro'i gdan rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhal bzhi po de rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis byang dang lho dang shar dang nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams su gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa drug po de rnams kyi rang rang gi gnas kyi ming gi yi ge dang po yongs su gyur pa las ro'i gdan rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: Their individual seat names transform from the first letters of their names.

original: phyi rol du ye shes kyi 'khor lo la shar gyi rtsibs su lam yig yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro ma'i yi dags kyi gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du ye shes kyi 'khor lo la shar gyi rtsibs su lam yig yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro ma'i yi dags kyi gdan no //
translated: On the outside, in the wheel of wisdom, on the eastern spoke, from the transformation of the syllable laṃ, is the seat of the preta of dakini.

original: nang du ni lte ba'i padma la dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i rtsa drug cu dang / thun mtshams kyi rtsa bzhi ste /
analyzed: nang du ni lte ba'i padma la dkyil 'khor 'bab pa'i rtsa drug cu dang / thun mtshams kyi rtsa bzhi ste /
translated: On the inside, on the navel lotus, there are sixty channel petals through which the mandala descends and four channel petals at the junctures.

original: de rnams su shar la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams la srog gi rlung 'gags pa ni ro'i gdan du brjod do //
analyzed: de rnams su shar la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams la srog gi rlung 'gags pa ni ro'i gdan du brjod do //
translated: The cessation of the life-force wind in those channels, beginning with the eastern channel, is called the seat of preta.

original: de ltar phyi rol du pam yig yongs su gyur pa las lho'i rtsibs su l'a ma'i'o //
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol du pam yig yongs su gyur pa las lho'i rtsibs su l'a ma'i'o //
translated: In that way, on the outside, from the transformation of the syllable paṃ, in the southern spoke, is laṃ.

original: @112a * // nub kyi rtsibs su mam yig yongs su gyur pa las dum skyes ma'i'o //
analyzed: @112a * // nub kyi rtsibs su mam yig yongs su gyur pa las dum skyes ma'i'o //
translated: On the western spoke, from the transformation of the syllable maṃ, is Caṇḍālī.

original: byang du tam yig yongs su gyur pa las gzugs can ma'i'o //
analyzed: byang du tam yig yongs su gyur pa las gzugs can ma'i'o //
translated: On the northern spoke, from the transformation of the syllable taṃ, is Ghasmarī.

original: phyogs bral rnams su dri chen dang dri chu dang khrag dang sha'i thod pa rnams so zhes pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: phyogs bral rnams su dri chen dang dri chu dang khrag dang sha'i thod pa rnams so zhes pa ye shes kyi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: In the intermediate directions are the skull cups of feces, urine, blood, and flesh.

original: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad po rnams la shar gyi dur khrod du shu yig yongs su gyur pa las ro'i gdan ni khra gdong ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad po rnams la shar gyi dur khrod du shu yig yongs su gyur pa las ro'i gdan ni khra gdong ma yin no //
translated: In the outer retinue, in the eight charnel grounds, in the eastern charnel ground, from the transformation of the syllable śu, on a corpse seat is the face of a vulture.

original: nang du ni kha'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni kha'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life vāyu is arrested in the nāḍī of the mouth.

original: de bzhin du phyi rol du sha yig yongs su gyur pa las lho ru 'ug gdong ma'i'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi rol du sha yig yongs su gyur pa las lho ru 'ug gdong ma'i'o //
translated: In the same way, externally, from the transformation of the syllable śa, in the south is the face of an owl.

original: nang du ni sna bug g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni sna bug g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life vāyu is arrested in the right nostril.

original: phyi rol du pu yig yongs su gyur pa las nub tu khyi gdong ma'i'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du pu yig yongs su gyur pa las nub tu khyi gdong ma'i'o //
translated: Externally, from the transformation of the syllable pu, in the west is the face of a dog.

original: nang du ni bshang lam gyi rtsa la thur sel gyi rlung 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni bshang lam gyi rtsa la thur sel gyi rlung 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the downward-voiding wind is blocked in the channel of the anus.

original: phyi rol du kli yig yongs su gyur pa las byang du phag gdong ma'i'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du kli yig yongs su gyur pa las byang du phag gdong ma'i'o //
translated: Externally, from the complete transformation of the syllable klim, in the north is Varāhī.

original: nang du ni sna bug g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni sna bug g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life wind is blocked in the channel of the left nostril.

original: phyi rol du ba yig yongs su gyur pa las dbang ldan du gshin rje brtan ma'i'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ba yig yongs su gyur pa las dbang ldan du gshin rje brtan ma'i'o //
translated: Externally, from the complete transformation of the syllable bam, in the northeast is Ghasmarī.

original: nang du ni rna ba g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni rna ba g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life wind is blocked in the channel of the left ear.

original: phyi rol du sa yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung du gshin rje pho nya ma'i'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du sa yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung du gshin rje pho nya ma'i'o //
translated: Externally, from the complete transformation of the syllable sam, in the northwest is Ghasmarī.

original: nang du ni rna ba g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni rna ba g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life wind is blocked in the channel of the right ear.

original: phyi rol du gho yig yongs su gyur pa las bden bral du gshin rje mche ba ma'i'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du gho yig yongs su gyur pa las bden bral du gshin rje mche ba ma'i'o //
translated: Externally, from the complete transformation of the syllable gham, in the southwest is Ghasmarī.

original: nang du ni mig g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni mig g-yas pa'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life wind is blocked in the channel of the right eye.

original: phyi rol du au yig yongs su gyur pa las me ru gshin rje 'joms ma'i yi dags kyi gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du au yig yongs su gyur pa las me ru gshin rje 'joms ma'i yi dags kyi gdan no //
translated: Externally, from the complete transformation of the syllable om, in the southeast is Ghasmarī.

original: nang du ni mig g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o zhes pa dur khrod brgyad po rnams su khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rig par bya'o /
analyzed: nang du ni mig g-yon pa'i rtsa la srog gi rlung 'gags pa'o zhes pa dur khrod brgyad po rnams su khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rig par bya'o /
translated: Internally, the life-force wind is blocked in the channel of the left eye.

original: // / da ni rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gnas kyi ming yig dang po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo la gdan rnams brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams kyis gnas kyi ming yig dang po'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo la gdan rnams brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the seats in the mind, speech, and body wheels, which are the first-syllables of the names of the places of Caṇḍālī and so forth, should be stated.

original: 'dir phyi rol du thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la p'u yig yongs su gyur pa las rab gtum ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol du thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la p'u yig yongs su gyur pa las rab gtum ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Here, externally, on the eastern spoke of the mind wheel, from the transformation of the syllable pū, there is the seat of Caṇḍālī’s corpse.

original: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyis chos kyi 'khor lor shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyis chos kyi 'khor lor shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, in the all-base, the life-force wind is blocked in the eastern channel of the mind wheel.

original: @112b drang ba'i don gyi phyi rol du spyi bor p'u yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: @112b drang ba'i don gyi phyi rol du spyi bor p'u yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the outer, interpretable meaning, the syllable pū is placed on the head.

original: de ltar phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la dz'a yig yongs su gyur pa las gtum mig ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la dz'a yig yongs su gyur pa las gtum mig ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: In this way, externally, on the southern spoke, from the transformation of the letter JA, there is the seat of the corpse of Caṇḍākṣī.

original: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the southern nāḍī.

original: drang ba'i don gyis spyi gtsug tu dz'a yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis spyi gtsug tu dz'a yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter JA is placed at the crown.

original: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la ao yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od ldan ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la ao yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od ldan ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the western spoke, from the transformation of the letter O, there is the seat of the corpse of Māmakī.

original: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the western nāḍī.

original: drang ba'i don gyis rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du aoo yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du aoo yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter O is placed above the right ear.

original: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la aa yig yongs su gyur pa las sna chen ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la aa yig yongs su gyur pa las sna chen ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the northern spoke, from the transformation of the letter A, there is the seat of the corpse of Mahānāsā.

original: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the northern nāḍī.

original: drang ba'i don gyis mgrin pa'i rgyab tu aa yig dgod pa'o zhes pa gnas kyi so bon dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis mgrin pa'i rgyab tu aa yig dgod pa'o zhes pa gnas kyi so bon dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter A is placed behind the throat.

original: de bzhin du thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la go yig yongs su gyur pa las dpa' bo'i blo can ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: de bzhin du thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la go yig yongs su gyur pa las dpa' bo'i blo can ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Likewise, on the wind petal of the mind wheel, the letter go completely transforms into the seat of the corpse of Śūkarṣaṇā.

original: nang du ni chos kyi 'khor lor dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni chos kyi 'khor lor dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the wind channel of the Dharma wheel.

original: drang ba'i don gyis rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du go yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du go yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter go is placed above the left ear.

original: phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la ra yig yongs su gyur pa las mi'u thung ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la ra yig yongs su gyur pa las mi'u thung ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the wind petal, the letter ra completely transforms into the seat of the corpse of the dwarf.

original: nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the wind channel.

original: drang ba'i don gyis smin ma'i dbus su r'a yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis smin ma'i dbus su r'a yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter ra is placed in the middle of the eyebrows.

original: phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la de yig yongs su gyur pa las lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la de yig yongs su gyur pa las lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ni ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the northwest petal, the letter de completely transforms into the seat of the corpse of Kālarātri.

original: nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the northwest channel.

original: drang ba'i don gyis mig gnyis la de yig dgod do //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis mig gnyis la de yig dgod do //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the letter de is placed in both eyes.

original: phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la m'a yig yongs su gyur pa las shing grib ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la m'a yig yongs su gyur pa las shing grib ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the petal of fire, the syllable mā fully transforms into a seat of the corpse of a forest tree.

original: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the fire channel.

original: drang ba'i don gyis dpung pa'i rtsa la m'a yig dgod pa'o zhes pa thugs kyi 'khor lo la nye ba'i gnas kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis dpung pa'i rtsa la m'a yig dgod pa'o zhes pa thugs kyi 'khor lo la nye ba'i gnas kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
translated: In the meaning of the words, the syllable mā is placed in the channel of the shoulder. This is the definition of the seats of the goddesses of the abode in the mind wheel.

original: de nas phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo dang nang du longs spyod 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / nang du yongs su bskor ba la rtsa brgyad de /
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo dang nang du longs spyod 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / nang du yongs su bskor ba la rtsa brgyad de /
translated: Then, externally, in the speech wheel, and internally, in the enjoyment wheel, there are thirty-two channels in the outer circle and eight channels in the inner circle.

original: 'di nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo la ji lta ba de ltar gdan rnams brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo la ji lta ba de ltar gdan rnams brjod par bya'o //
translated: The seats should be described in the same way as in the Dharma wheel.

original: phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar @113a * //
analyzed: phyi rol du gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar @113a * //
translated: Externally, on the eastern petal of the speech wheel,

original: gyi rtsibs la k'a yig yongs su gyur pa las sa srungs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: gyi rtsibs la k'a yig yongs su gyur pa las sa srungs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: the syllable kā fully transforms into a seat of the corpse of Pṛthivī.

original: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyi longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang gi yongs su bskor ba'i shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /🔽drang ba'i don gyis mchan khung gnyis su k'a yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyi longs spyod 'khor lo'i nang gi yongs su bskor ba'i shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste / drang ba'i don gyis mchan khung gnyis su k'a yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the eastern nāḍī, which is the complete enjoyment of the definitive meaning.

original: phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la ao yig yongs su gyur pa las 'jigs byed chen mo'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la ao yig yongs su gyur pa las 'jigs byed chen mo'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: In the outer, the seat of the corpse of Mahābhairavā arises from the transformation of the syllable oṃ on the southern petal.

original: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /🔽drang ba'i don gyis nu ma gnyis la ao yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste / drang ba'i don gyis nu ma gnyis la ao yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the southern nāḍī.

original: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la tri yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung shugs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la tri yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung shugs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: In the outer, the seat of the corpse of Vāyuvegā arises from the transformation of the syllable tri on the western petal.

original: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /🔽drang ba'i don gyis lte ba la tri yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste / drang ba'i don gyis lte ba la tri yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the western nāḍī.

original: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la ko yig yongs su gyur pa las chang 'thung ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la ko yig yongs su gyur pa las chang 'thung ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: In the outer, the seat of the corpse of Surābhakṣī arises from the transformation of the syllable ka on the northern petal.

original: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the northern nāḍī.

original: drang ba'i don gyis sna'i rtse mor ko yig dgod pa'o zhes pa zhing dang nye ba'i zhing gi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis sna'i rtse mor ko yig dgod pa'o zhes pa zhing dang nye ba'i zhing gi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the term is that the syllable ka is placed at the tip of the nose.

original: de ltar phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la ka yig yongs su gyur pa las lha mo sngo bsangs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la ka yig yongs su gyur pa las lha mo sngo bsangs ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: In this way, on the outer petal of Isana, the syllable ka transforms into the seat of the corpse of the goddess Syama.

original: nang du ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo'i dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Inwardly, the life force is blocked in the Isana channel of the throat cakra.

original: drang ba'i don gyis kha la ka yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis kha la ka yig dgod pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the term is that the syllable ka is placed on the mouth.

original: phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la la yig yongs su gyur pa las shin tu bzang mo'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la la yig yongs su gyur pa las shin tu bzang mo'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: On the outer petal of Vayu, the syllable la transforms into the seat of the corpse of Suvarcalā.

original: nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis mgrin par la yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis mgrin par la yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Inwardly, the life force is blocked in the Vayu channel. The meaning of the term is that the syllable la is placed on the throat.

original: phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la ka yig yongs su gyur pa las rta rna ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la ka yig yongs su gyur pa las rta rna ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: On the outer petal of Nirriti, the syllable ka transforms into the seat of the corpse of Hayakarṇī.

original: nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis snying gar ka yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis snying gar ka yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the rasanā nāḍī; in the interpretable meaning, the letter ka is placed at the heart.

original: phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la hi yig yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro gdong ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la hi yig yongs su gyur pa las mkha' 'gro gdong ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the spoke of fire, the letter hi is transformed into the seat of the corpse of the dakini Ghasmarī.🔽Internally, the life-force is blocked in the fire nāḍī; in the interpretable meaning, the letter hi is placed between the genitals.

original: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis mdoms bar du hi yig dgod pa'o zhes pa gsung gi 'khor lo la 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis mdoms bar du hi yig dgod pa'o zhes pa gsung gi 'khor lo la 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa ste /
translated: Thus, the seed syllables of the seats of the yoginīs of the speech wheel, including the desire and lesser desire, are placed.

original: longs spyod kyi gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: longs spyod kyi gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: This is in the enjoyment wheel of speech.

original: de ltar na zhing dang nye ba'i zhing @113b dang 'dun pa dang nye bar 'dun pa'i lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhing dang nye ba'i zhing @113b dang 'dun pa dang nye bar 'dun pa'i lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, the seats of the goddesses of the desire and lesser desire fields are ascertained.

original: de nas phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo dang nang du dpral bar lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu drug dang nang gi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa brgyad de /
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo dang nang du dpral bar lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu drug dang nang gi yongs su bskor ba la rtsa brgyad de /
translated: Then, the wheel of body outside and the wheel of the innate inside the forehead are completely surrounded by sixteen channels outside and eight channels inside.

original: 'di nyid la longs spyod 'khor lo la ji lta ba de ltar gdan rnams brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid la longs spyod 'khor lo la ji lta ba de ltar gdan rnams brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the seats should be described just as in the case of the wheel of enjoyment.

original: 'dir phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la pre yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol du sku'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la pre yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Here, on the outer wheel of body, on the eastern spoke, from the transformation of the syllable pre, there is a seat of the corpse of Cakravegā.

original: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni nges pa'i don gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Inside, in the definitive meaning, on the eastern channel of the wheel of the innate, the life-force is blocked.

original: drang ba'i don gyis rtags la pre yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis rtags la pre yig dgod pa'o //
translated: In the interpretable meaning, the syllable pre is placed on the sign.

original: phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la gre yig yongs su gyur ba las du ma skyes ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du lho'i rtsibs la gre yig yongs su gyur ba las du ma skyes ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: On the outer wheel, on the southern spoke, from the transformation of the syllable tre, there is a seat of the corpse of Anekajaṭā.

original: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis bshang lam du gri yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni lho'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis bshang lam du gri yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the southern nāḍī, and in the outer, the seed syllable of the messenger is placed in the anus.

original: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la soo yig yongs su gyur pa las shoondi ni'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du nub kyi rtsibs la soo yig yongs su gyur pa las shoondi ni'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the western petal, the syllable so is transformed into the corpse seat of Śonḍinī.

original: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis brla zung la soo yig dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni nub kyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis brla zung la soo yig dgod pa'o //
translated: Internally, the life-force is blocked in the western nāḍī, and in the outer, the seed syllable of the messenger is placed on the two thighs.

original: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la su yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: phyi rol du byang gi rtsibs la su yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Externally, on the northern petal, the syllable su is transformed into the corpse seat of Cakravarmiṇī.🔽Internally, the life-force is blocked in the northern nāḍī, and in the outer, the seed syllable of the messenger is placed on the two calves.

original: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis byin pa gnyis la su yig dgod pa'o zhes pa 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa'i pho nya mo rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa'o //
analyzed: nang du ni byang gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis byin pa gnyis la su yig dgod pa'o zhes pa 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa'i pho nya mo rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa'o //
translated: Thus, the seed syllables of the messengers of the Saṃvaras and the Upasṃvaras are placed on the seats.

original: de nas phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la na yig yongs su gyur pa las shin tu dpa' mo'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la na yig yongs su gyur pa las shin tu dpa' mo'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Then, externally, on the northeast petal, the syllable na is transformed into the corpse seat of Subāhu.

original: nang du ni dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis rkang pa'i sor mo rnams la na yig dgod pa'o //🔽phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la si yig yongs su gyur pa las stobs chen ma'i ro'i gdan no //🔽nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis rkang pa'i rgyab dag la si yig dgod pa'o ;
analyzed: nang du ni dbang ldan gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis rkang pa'i sor mo rnams la na yig dgod pa'o // phyi rol du rlung gi rtsibs la si yig yongs su gyur pa las stobs chen ma'i ro'i gdan no // nang du ni rlung gi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste drang ba'i don gyis rkang pa'i rgyab dag la si yig dgod pa'o ;
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the nāḍī of Indra. In the outer, the syllable si is transformed into the seat of the corpse of Mahābala in the wind petal.

original: / phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la ma yig yongs su gyur ba las 'khor los sgyur ma'i ro'i gdan no //🔽nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ster drang ba'i don gyis rkang ba'i mthe bong dag la ma yig dgod pa'o //🔽phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la ku yig yongs su gyur @114a * //
analyzed: / phyi rol du bden bral gyi rtsibs la ma yig yongs su gyur ba las 'khor los sgyur ma'i ro'i gdan no // nang du ni bden bral gyi rtsa la srog 'gags pa ster drang ba'i don gyis rkang ba'i mthe bong dag la ma yig dgod pa'o // phyi rol du me'i rtsibs la ku yig yongs su gyur @114a * //
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the nāḍī of the wind. In the outer, the syllable ma is transformed into the seat of the corpse of Cakravegā in the petal of Nairṛtī.

original: ba las brtson 'grus chen mo'i ro'i gdan no //
analyzed: ba las brtson 'grus chen mo'i ro'i gdan no //
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the nāḍī of Nairṛtī. In the outer, the syllable ku is transformed into the seat of the corpse of Mahāvīryā in the petal of Agni.

original: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
analyzed: nang du ni me'i rtsa la srog 'gags pa ste /
translated: Internally, the life force is blocked in the nāḍī of Agni.

original: drang ba'i don gyis pus mo gnyis la ku yig dgod pa'o zhes pa sku'i 'khor lo la dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa ste /
analyzed: drang ba'i don gyis pus mo gnyis la ku yig dgod pa'o zhes pa sku'i 'khor lo la dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi sa bon dgod pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the words is that the two knees are marked with the syllable ku.🔽This is the seed-syllable of the goddesses of the charnel grounds and the adjacent charnel grounds in the wheel of body.

original: de ltar na sku'i 'khor lo la 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa dang dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na sku'i 'khor lo la 'dus pa dang nye ba'i 'dus pa dang dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod kyi lha mo rnams kyi gdan gyi nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, this is the definition of the seats of the goddesses of the assembly, the adjacent assembly, the charnel grounds, and the adjacent charnel grounds in the wheel of body.

original: 'dir phyi rol du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gnas la sogs par 'gro ba'i don du yi dags kyi gdan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du khams thams cad kyi srog gi rlung 'gags pas gdan zhes pa dang / ji ltar phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'dus par rang rang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams su ro'i gdan rnams la gnas pa de bzhin du nang du srog gi rlung rnams kyis rang rang gi 'khor lo'i rtsa la bum pa can gyi sbyor bas gnas pa ni nges pa'i
analyzed: 'dir phyi rol du mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gnas la sogs par 'gro ba'i don du yi dags kyi gdan rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du khams thams cad kyi srog gi rlung 'gags pas gdan zhes pa dang / ji ltar phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'dus par rang rang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams su ro'i gdan rnams la gnas pa de bzhin du nang du srog gi rlung rnams kyis rang rang gi 'khor lo'i rtsa la bum pa can gyi sbyor bas gnas pa ni nges pa'i
translated: Just as the seats of the corpses are located on the spokes of one's own wheel in the gathering of the ganacakra outside, in the same way, inside, the life-force winds are located on the spokes of one's own wheel through the practice of vase breathing. This is the definitive meaning.

original: don to // 'dir phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo la pho nya ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi mi'i pags pa ro rnam par dag pa rnams bshad pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags te rang rang gi gnas su sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: don to // 'dir phyi rol du tshogs kyi 'khor lo la pho nya ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi mi'i pags pa ro rnam par dag pa rnams bshad pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags te rang rang gi gnas su sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Here, in the ganacakra outside, the human skins of the thirty-six messengers are the pure corpses. The seed syllables of the bhagavān are recited seven times and given to each of their places.

original: dbus su gtso bo'i ba lang gi pags pa dang stag gi pags pa'o zhes pa gdan gyi cho ga'o //
analyzed: dbus su gtso bo'i ba lang gi pags pa dang stag gi pags pa'o zhes pa gdan gyi cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of the seat.

original: 'dir rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rang rang gi ming yig dang po'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa chos kyi 'khor lor sa bon de dang de nyid kyis mngon par bsngags te gnas nas gnas su kun du spyod par bya'o zhes pa rgyud thams cad du nges
analyzed: 'dir rab gtum ma la sogs pa rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyi rang rang gi ming yig dang po'i sa bon gyis bskyed pa chos kyi 'khor lor sa bon de dang de nyid kyis mngon par bsngags te gnas nas gnas su kun du spyod par bya'o zhes pa rgyud thams cad du nges
translated: Here, one should generate the seed-syllable of the first letter of the name of each of the goddesses, such as Caṇḍa, and so forth, and the ḍākinī, and so forth, and with those very seed-syllables, one should consecrate the places in the dharmacakra, and one should practice in the places.🔽This is ascertained in all the tantras.

original: pa'o // da ni kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i don du dam tshig gi ril bu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: pa'o // da ni kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i don du dam tshig gi ril bu brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, in order to purify the mouth, and so forth, one should recite the pledge-pill.

original: 'dir nam mkha' la sogs pa yon tan re re 'phel ba'i dbye bas bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga rnams gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir nam mkha' la sogs pa yon tan re re 'phel ba'i dbye bas bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga rnams gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Here, one should take the five ambrosias and the five lights by the division of the increase of each of the qualities, such as space, and so forth.

original: gang gi tshe zla ba dang nyi ma gcig tu sbyor ba'i zla ba gcig la 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zla ba dang nyi ma gcig tu sbyor ba'i zla ba gcig la 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: When the moon and sun are joined as one, the moon is held in one month.

original: dang po zla ba dang phyi nas nyi ma'am /
analyzed: dang po zla ba dang phyi nas nyi ma'am /
translated: First, the moon, and later, the sun.

original: dang por nyi ma dang phyi nas zla ba 'dzin pa'i zla ba de dang de la'o //
analyzed: dang por nyi ma dang phyi nas zla ba 'dzin pa'i zla ba de dang de la'o //
translated: First, the sun, and later, the moon, in that and that month.

original: 'dir zla ba bzung ba'i tshes gcig 'jug pa'i dus na /
analyzed: 'dir zla ba bzung ba'i tshes gcig 'jug pa'i dus na /
translated: Here, when the first day of the month of the moon-graha is entered,

original: bu mo lo bcu gnyis ma'am lo bcu drug lon pa kha dog dkar @114b ba bu ma skyes pa la yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bya ste /
analyzed: bu mo lo bcu gnyis ma'am lo bcu drug lon pa kha dog dkar @114b ba bu ma skyes pa la yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bya ste /
translated: a girl of twelve or sixteen years, white-complexioned, not previously having had sex, should be worshipped with all articles.

original: lha'i dmigs pa bya ste padmar rdo rje bcug ste /
analyzed: lha'i dmigs pa bya ste padmar rdo rje bcug ste /
translated: The deity should be visualized, and the vajra should be inserted into the lotus.

original: h'um phat yi ges byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya zhing spro ba na 'og tu padma'i snod bzhag nas rdo rje padma'i snod der gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um phat yi ges byang chub kyi sems spro bar bya zhing spro ba na 'og tu padma'i snod bzhag nas rdo rje padma'i snod der gzhug par bya'o //
translated: With the syllables hūṃ and phaṭ, the bodhicitta should be emitted. When emitting, having placed the lotus vessel below, the vajra should be inserted into that lotus vessel.

original: tshes gnyis pa la ro la mchod par byas nas glad pa blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshes gnyis pa la ro la mchod par byas nas glad pa blang bar bya'o //
translated: On the second day, having worshipped a corpse, the brain should be taken.

original: gsum pa la mi mo dkar sham la mchod pa byas nas rin po che'i rdul blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa la mi mo dkar sham la mchod pa byas nas rin po che'i rdul blang bar bya'o //
translated: On the third day, having worshipped a white woman, the precious dust should be taken.

original: bzhi pa la rang gi rdo rje'i chu blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa la rang gi rdo rje'i chu blang bar bya'o //
translated: On the fourth day, one’s own vajra water should be taken.

original: lnga pa la dri chen blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: lnga pa la dri chen blang bar bya'o //
translated: On the fifth day, feces should be taken.

original: de ltar khu ba ma sha ka gcig dang / glad pa ma sha ka gnyis dang / rin chen 'byung ldan ma sha ka gsum dang / rdo rje'i chu ma sha ka bzhi dang / rnam par snang mdzad ma sha ka lnga ste /
analyzed: de ltar khu ba ma sha ka gcig dang / glad pa ma sha ka gnyis dang / rin chen 'byung ldan ma sha ka gsum dang / rdo rje'i chu ma sha ka bzhi dang / rnam par snang mdzad ma sha ka lnga ste /
translated: Thus, one part of semen, two parts of brain, three parts of Ratnasaṃbhava, four parts of vajra water, and five parts of Vairocana.

original: de ltar nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams yon tan gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang 'phel ba'i dbye bas nyin zhag lngas rdzas lnga rnams blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams yon tan gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang 'phel ba'i dbye bas nyin zhag lngas rdzas lnga rnams blang bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the five substances are to be taken in five days, by the division of the increase of one, two, three, four, and five qualities of space, wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: de nas drug pa la ro la mchod par byas nas mi'i sha dang / bdun pa la rta'i sha dang / brgyad pa la so ldan gyi sha dang / dgu pa la khyi'i sha dang / bcu pa la ba lang gi sha blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas drug pa la ro la mchod par byas nas mi'i sha dang / bdun pa la rta'i sha dang / brgyad pa la so ldan gyi sha dang / dgu pa la khyi'i sha dang / bcu pa la ba lang gi sha blang bar bya ste /
translated: Then, on the sixth day, having made an offering to the corpse, one should take human flesh, on the seventh day horse flesh, on the eighth day donkey flesh, on the ninth day dog flesh, and on the tenth day cow flesh.

original: cha gcig dang cha gnyis dang cha gsum dang cha bzhi dang cha lnga ji lta ba'i ri ma pas sgron ma blangs te ;
analyzed: cha gcig dang cha gnyis dang cha gsum dang cha bzhi dang cha lnga ji lta ba'i ri ma pas sgron ma blangs te ;
translated: One should take the lamps, one part, two parts, three parts, four parts, and five parts, respectively, by the measure of the parts.

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang gcig tu byas nas ma sha ka bdun cu rtsa lnga rnams so //🔽de nas sbrang rtsi bco lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga lhan cig tu byas te /
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang gcig tu byas nas ma sha ka bdun cu rtsa lnga rnams so // de nas sbrang rtsi bco lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga lhan cig tu byas te /
translated: Having made the five nectars into one, there are seventy-five māṣas.

original: tshes bcu gcig pa la zas ma zos par /🔽sbrang chang ngam /
analyzed: tshes bcu gcig pa la zas ma zos par / sbrang chang ngam /
translated: Then, having made the fifteen honey and the five nectars into one, on the eleventh day, without eating food,🔽drink fermented grain alcohol,

original: bu ram chang ngam /
analyzed: bu ram chang ngam /
translated: molasses alcohol,

original: rgun chang ngam /🔽shing t'a la la sogs pa skyes pa 'am /🔽'bras las skyes pa'am /
analyzed: rgun chang ngam / shing t'a la la sogs pa skyes pa 'am / 'bras las skyes pa'am /
translated: grape alcohol,🔽or whatever fermented alcohol you like, such as from the tala tree,🔽or from rice,

original: sbyar ba'i chang ji ltar 'dod pa 'thungs nas skyug par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyar ba'i chang ji ltar 'dod pa 'thungs nas skyug par bya'o //
translated: and then vomit.

original: skyugs pa de thod par blangs la rdzas bcu po de rnams dang btags par bya'o //
analyzed: skyugs pa de thod par blangs la rdzas bcu po de rnams dang btags par bya'o //
translated: Take that vomit into a skull cup and mix it with those ten substances.

original: de nas ce spyang gi rgyal bu blangs te de'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ce spyang gi rgyal bu blangs te de'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken the son of a jackal, place it inside.

original: de nas thod pa kha sbyar du bya ste /
analyzed: de nas thod pa kha sbyar du bya ste /
translated: Then, having sealed the skull cup,

original: de nyid du mtshan mo'i dus na dur khrod kyi sa gzhir skyes pa'i ro dang bud med kyi ro lhan cig me la bcug nas bsregs pa'i sa'i 'og tu khru gang khru gsum du brkos te der dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas /
analyzed: de nyid du mtshan mo'i dus na dur khrod kyi sa gzhir skyes pa'i ro dang bud med kyi ro lhan cig me la bcug nas bsregs pa'i sa'i 'og tu khru gang khru gsum du brkos te der dri dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas /
translated: At night, in the place of the charnel ground, one should worship with perfumes, incense, and so forth, having dug down one cubit or three cubits into the ground where a corpse and a woman’s corpse have been burned together.

original: sngags kyi cho ga 'dis gtor ma rgya chen po dbul @115a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi cho ga 'dis gtor ma rgya chen po dbul @115a * //
translated: With this mantra rite, one should offer a great bali.

original: bar bya'o // aom badzra kro dhe shva ri sarbba dra bya ni pi sho dha ya h'um phat /
analyzed: bar bya'o // aom badzra kro dhe shva ri sarbba dra bya ni pi sho dha ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ vajra-krodheśvari sarva-dravya-niviśodhaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pa gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: ces pa gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for purifying the bali.🔽The Buddhas, the Fathers and Mothers, the Sons, the retinue,

original: sangs rgyas yab yum bcas pa sras bcas g-yog 'khor dang // grogs bcas gnyen rnams dag gis bskor ba'i tshogs pa ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yab yum bcas pa sras bcas g-yog 'khor dang // grogs bcas gnyen rnams dag gis bskor ba'i tshogs pa ni //
translated: the friends, and the relatives, the assembly surrounded by the circle of friends,🔽are pleased by the assembly of gods and goddesses,

original: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mnyes par byed pa dang // mchog gi rdo rje sems dpa' dag ni gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mnyes par byed pa dang // mchog gi rdo rje sems dpa' dag ni gshegs su gsol //
translated: and the supreme Vajrasattva is invited.

original: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'o //
translated: This is the invitation of all the Tathāgatas.

original: aom shr'i he ru ka a'a kaddhya ya /🔽pra pe sha ya /🔽pra be sha ya /🔽bandha ya bandha ya /
analyzed: aom shr'i he ru ka a'a kaddhya ya / pra pe sha ya / pra be sha ya / bandha ya bandha ya /
translated: Enter!🔽Bind! Bind!

original: to sha ya to sha ya /
analyzed: to sha ya to sha ya /
translated: Rejoice! Rejoice!

original: sarbba d'a ki n'i n'am /
analyzed: sarbba d'a ki n'i n'am /
translated: To all the ḍākinīs,

original: hri da yam dza: h'um bam ho: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: hri da yam dza: h'um bam ho: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: hṛdaya, jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgug pa'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for summoning the ḍākinīs.

original: aom sumbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /🔽aom gri hna gri hna hum h'um phat /🔽aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat / aom gri hna gri hna hum h'um phat / aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, sumbha ni sumbha huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, gṛhṇa gṛhṇa huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an badzra r'a dza hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an badzra r'a dza hum h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, ānayaho bhagavān vajrarāja huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: zhes pa gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes pa gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra for offering the bali.

original: de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
analyzed: de nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa phul te /
translated: Then offer the water for drinking and for the feet, and so forth.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ, Śrī Vajra Heruka, he he, ru ru, kaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ, dakini jālāṁvarā svāhā.

original: sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te /
analyzed: sngags 'dis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te /
translated: Recite this mantra one hundred and eight times, and consecrate the bali.

original: sa brkos pa der gzhug par bya zhing dur khrod kyi thal bas bkang nas steng du ral gri chen po gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: sa brkos pa der gzhug par bya zhing dur khrod kyi thal bas bkang nas steng du ral gri chen po gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should bury it in the pit that was dug, fill it with charnel ground ash, and place a great sword on top.

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
translated: With the mantra Oṃ vajra vairocanīye svāhā,

original: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya ste rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas /
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis bsrung bar bya ste rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas /
translated: one should protect it, and when it has come into one’s house,

original: bcu gnyis pa la thun bzhir zhal bzhi pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa la thun bzhir zhal bzhi pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: on the twelfth day one should recite the mantra of the four-faced one in four sessions.

original: bcu gsum pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang bcu bzhi pa la rkang pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang bcu bzhi pa la rkang pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
translated: On the thirteenth day, the eight-line one, and on the fourteenth day, the twenty-four-line one.

original: de nas gnam stong la nyi ma gzas bzung ba na bton nas mi'i rkang dang bsres la sran chung gi tshad tsam gyi ril bu byas la ril bu de bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa la kunda go la las byung ba dang bcas pas bsangs pas
analyzed: de nas gnam stong la nyi ma gzas bzung ba na bton nas mi'i rkang dang bsres la sran chung gi tshad tsam gyi ril bu byas la ril bu de bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa la kunda go la las byung ba dang bcas pas bsangs pas
translated: Then, on the full moon day, when the sun is eclipsed, one should take it out, mix it with human bone, make a pill the size of a jujube seed, and eat that pill together with one’s food and drink, etc.,

original: rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par dag par 'gyur te /
translated: purified by the mantra of the four-faced one.

original: khar bcug pas kha dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khar bcug pas kha dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: By placing it in the mouth, the mouth is purified.

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bsgom pa'i dus na yang thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ril bu'i cho ga'i nges pa'o /
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang bsgom pa'i dus na yang thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ril bu'i cho ga'i nges pa'o /
translated: At the time of the gaṇacakra and meditation, all will be protected.

original: // / da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po la sngar bshad pa'i g-yung mo dang dmangs rigs la sogs pa rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi pho nya mo rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba'i cho ga brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: // / da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po la sngar bshad pa'i g-yung mo dang dmangs rigs la sogs pa rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi pho nya mo rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba'i cho ga brjod par bya'o //
translated: Now, in the great gaṇacakra, one should explain the rite of eating and drinking with the messengers of the thirty-six clans, such as the untouchable and the low-caste woman, as previously explained.

original: @115b 'dir skye bo dang bral ba'i khang ba'am shin tu sbas pa'i gnas su rigs kyi pho nya mo gos dang bral ba thams cad dang sgrub pa po nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyang phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa rang rang gi gnas su rnal 'byor
analyzed: @115b 'dir skye bo dang bral ba'i khang ba'am shin tu sbas pa'i gnas su rigs kyi pho nya mo gos dang bral ba thams cad dang sgrub pa po nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyang phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa rang rang gi gnas su rnal 'byor
translated: Here, in a house free of people or in a very hidden place, the messenger of the clan, naked and without clothes, and the twenty-four adepts, also adorned with the five symbolic ornaments, should be seated in their own places.

original: ma skra grol ba rnams dang / sgrub pa po ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa rnams mi'i pags pa'i steng du 'dug cing tshogs kyi bdag po ni 'khor lo'i dbus su ba lang dang stag gi pags pa'i steng du'o //
analyzed: ma skra grol ba rnams dang / sgrub pa po ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa rnams mi'i pags pa'i steng du 'dug cing tshogs kyi bdag po ni 'khor lo'i dbus su ba lang dang stag gi pags pa'i steng du'o //
translated: The practitioners, with their hair bound up in a topknot, sit on human skin. The lord of the ganacakra sits in the middle of the wheel on the skin of a cow and a tiger.

original: de nas mi'i pags pa khru gang tsam gyis sder byas te tshogs kyi gtso bo la dbul bar bya'o //
